ADDON_Bell_AllseeingSpirit.Name: "All Seeing" - Spirit
ADDON_Bell_AllseeingSpirit.Description:
The Kra-Frabai symbol, representing The Entity watching over us, glows ominously on the head of the bell.
  • Unlocks awesome potential in one's aura reading ability. While Cloaked, the repair progress of generators can be determined by the intensity of their auras.

ADDON_Bell_AllseeingWhite.Name: "The Serpent" - Soot
ADDON_Bell_AllseeingWhite.Description:
The Oas-Nek symbol, representing cunning, is finger-drawn out of soot on the body of the bell.
  • The Wraith will Uncloak completely when breaking pallets or walls, or damaging generators while Cloaked.

ADDON_Bell_BlindBlood.Name: "Shadow Dance" - White
ADDON_Bell_BlindBlood.Description:
The Yiwarick symbol, representing dark synergy, is finger-drawn in white ink on the body of the Bell.
  • Increases speed of vaulting windows, breaking pallets or walls, and damaging generators by 40% while cloaked.

ADDON_Bell_BlindSpirit.Name: "Shadow Dance" - Blood
ADDON_Bell_BlindSpirit.Description:
The Yiwarick symbol, representing dark synergy, is stamped in blood on the body of the Bell.
  • Increases speed of vaulting windows, breaking pallets or walls, and damaging generators by 60% while cloaked.

ADDON_Bell_BlindWhite.Name: "Blind Warrior" - White
ADDON_Bell_BlindWhite.Description:
The Baikra-Kaeug symbol, representing ferocity, is finger-drawn in white ink on the body of the Bell.
  • Uncloak surprise attacks inflict Mangled and Hemorrhage until fully healed.

    • Hemorrhage increases blood trails left by injured Survivors.
    Mangled increases time required to heal by 25% and lasts until fully healed.

ADDON_Bell_CoxcombedClapper.Name: Coxcombed Clapper
ADDON_Bell_CoxcombedClapper.Description:
A simple coxcomb knotted rope wrapped around the bell clapper to muffle its sound. A malevolent aura emanates from it.
  • Renders the Wailing Bell completely silent.

ADDON_Bell_SwiftMud.Name: "Swift Hunt" - White
ADDON_Bell_SwiftMud.Description:
The Kuntin-Takkho symbol, representing rapid descent on prey, is finger-drawn in white ink on the body of the Bell.
  • Increases uncloaking speed by 10%.

ADDON_Bell_WindstormBlood.Name: "Windstorm" - Blood
ADDON_Bell_WindstormBlood.Description:
The Ohuwe-Onmnea symbol, representing a howling storm, is stamped in blood on the body of the bell.
  • Increases the Wraith's movement speed while cloaked by 9%.

ADDON_Chainsaw_CarburatorGuide.Name: Tuned Carburetor
ADDON_Chainsaw_CarburatorGuide.Description:
Despite being caked in dirt and oil, this carburetor has been well adjusted.
  • Increases Chainsaw charge speed by 25%.
  • Decreases base movement speed to 4.4 m/s.

ADDON_Chainsaw_DeathEngravings.Name: Death Engravings
ADDON_Chainsaw_DeathEngravings.Description:
Engravings found on the Chainsaw body counting the amount of lives it took. Fills the user with determination.
  • Increases Chainsaw Sprint movement speed by 15%.
  • Increases time required to charge the Chainsaw by 14%.
  • Decreases heat generated while charging the Chainsaw by 14%.

ADDON_Chainsaw_DoomEngravings.Name: Doom Engravings
ADDON_Chainsaw_DoomEngravings.Description:
Engravings found on the Chainsaw body representing the dark beast that lives in The Fog. Fills the user with determination.
  • Increases Chainsaw Sprint movement speed by 20%.
  • Increases time required to charge the Chainsaw by 14%.
  • Decreases heat generated while charging the Chainsaw by 14%.

ADDON_Chainsaw_HomemadeMuffler.Name: Apex Muffler
ADDON_Chainsaw_HomemadeMuffler.Description:
A masterfully crafted chainsaw muffler that outperforms all others.
  • Chainsaw is silent for Survivors outside the Terror Radius.

ADDON_Chainsaw_LightChassis.Name: Low Kickback Chains
ADDON_Chainsaw_LightChassis.Description:
A specialized chain that reduces the likelihood of kickback.
  • Decreases recovery time after hitting an object with the Chainsaw by 28%.

ADDON_Chainsaw_ThompsonMix.Name: Pighouse Gloves
ADDON_Chainsaw_ThompsonMix.Description:
Rancid smelling gloves, soiled with unknown substances. Despite everything wrong with them, they do have thick fabric.
While the Chainsaw is overheated:
  • Increases action speed by 20% when breaking pallets or walls or damaging generators.
  • Decreases duration of pallet stuns by 50%.

    • "Ain’t no mess can stain a hard-workin' man’s soul." — Max Thompson Sr.

ADDON_Chainsaw_ThompsonMoonshine.Name: Spiked Boots
ADDON_Chainsaw_ThompsonMoonshine.Description:
Boots with strapped-on pieces of metal which burrow in mud for more stability and control with each step.
  • Increases Chainsaw Sprint turn speed by 44%
  • Increases recovery time after hitting an object with the Chainsaw by 28%

ADDON_flashlight_highendsapphire.Name: High-end Sapphire lens
ADDON_flashlight_highendsapphire.Description:
A wide lens made of unscratchable sapphire that optimises the power and range of the light beam.
  • Increases the range of the Flashlight beam by 25%.
  • Increases the width of the Flashlight beam by 25%.
  • Increases the brightness of the Flashlight beam by 30%.
  • Increases Blindness duration by 15%.

ADDON_flashlight_intensehalogen.Name: Intense Halogen
ADDON_flashlight_intensehalogen.Description:
A chemical bulb that generates an intensely clear light.
  • Increases the brightness of the Flashlight beam by 40%.
  • Increases Blindness duration by 20%.

ADDON_flashlight_lonflifebattery.Name: Long Life Battery
ADDON_flashlight_lonflifebattery.Description:
A recent model of battery that lasts longer.
  • Adds 6 seconds of use to the Flashlight.

ADDON_flashlight_oddbulb.Name: Odd Bulb
ADDON_flashlight_oddbulb.Description:
A heavy and completely opaque bulb of unknown origin which emits a faint light even when turned off.
  • Increases the brightness of the Flashlight beam by 50%.
  • Increases Blindness duration by 25%.
  • Increases Flashlight battery consumption by 14%.

ADDON_flashlight_rubbergrip.Name: Rubber Grip
ADDON_flashlight_rubbergrip.Description:
A rubber grip specifically fitting Flashlights for more grip.
  • Increases the accuracy of the Flashlight beam by 40%.

ADDON_medkit_abdominaldressing.Name: Abdominal Dressing
ADDON_medkit_abdominaldressing.Description:
A highly absorbent pad that prevents bodily fluid leakage when applied to large abdominal wounds.
  • Increases healing speed by 25%.
  • Decreases Med-kit charges by 8.

ADDON_medkit_gauzeroll.Name: Gauze Roll
ADDON_medkit_gauzeroll.Description:
A sterile gauze used for a variety of wounds. Part of a total wound care system.
  • Adds 12 charges to the Med-kit.

ADDON_medkit_needleandthread.Name: Needle & Thread
ADDON_medkit_needleandthread.Description:
Not exactly a medical device, however it can be used to quickly and painfully close up a wound.
  • Increases the chances of triggering a Skill Check by 10%.
  • 100% Bonus Bloodpoints granted for succeeding Great Skill Checks.
  • Increases healing speed by 15%.

ADDON_medkit_selfadherentwrap.Name: Self Adherent Wrap
ADDON_medkit_selfadherentwrap.Description:
A pack of bandages that sticks to themselves without the need of clips for a faster patch-up that requires less readjustments.
  • Adds 8 charges to the Med-kit.
  • Increases healing speed by 5%.

ADDON_medkit_surgicalsuture.Name: Surgical Suture
ADDON_medkit_surgicalsuture.Description:
A medical device used to close and hold body tissue. Even though it's very effective, the surgical suture is challenging to use.
  • Increases the chances of triggering a Skill Check by 15%.
  • 150% Bonus Bloodpoints granted for succeeding Great Skill Checks.
  • Increases healing speed by 15%.

ADDON_toolbox_cuttingwire.Name: Cutting Wire
ADDON_toolbox_cuttingwire.Description:
A rudimentary cutting tool made from a jagged metal wire and two wooden handles.
  • Increases the Toolbox's sabotage speed by 15%.

ADDON_toolbox_socketswivels.Name: Socket Swivels
ADDON_toolbox_socketswivels.Description:
Swivels provide bend and flexibility for bolts that are out of reach, deep within mechanical devices.
  • Increases the Toolbox repair speed by 30%.

ADDON_toolbox_springclamp.Name: Spring Clamp
ADDON_toolbox_springclamp.Description:
Useful tool to clamp hoses or hold wires in place and prevent damage or injury.
  • The distance at which your repairs can be heard is reduced by 8 meters.

ADDON_trap_BloodyCoil.Name: Bloody Coil
ADDON_trap_BloodyCoil.Description:
Part sticky, part slippery, this grim liquid makes handling the traps' springs more dangerous.
  • When a Bear Trap is disarmed by a healthy Survivor, the bloody coils exact their price and that Survivor becomes injured.

ADDON_trap_DiamondStone.Name: Iridescent Stone
ADDON_trap_DiamondStone.Description:
Traps sharpened with this sickly gleaming stone seem to gain a life of their own.
  • Every 30 seconds, one closed Bear Trap chosen at random becomes set.

ADDON_trap_OilyCoil.Name: Oily Coil
ADDON_trap_OilyCoil.Description:
An oiled spring that marks the hands of those who meddle with a Bear Trap.
  • When resetting a Bear Trap, reveal the aura of the most recent Survivor to disarm it for 5 seconds.

ADDON_trap_RustedJaw.Name: Rusted Jaws
ADDON_trap_RustedJaw.Description:
These Bear Trap jaws are covered with crusty and volatile rust spots that makes injuries particularly difficult to heal.
  • Bear Traps inflict Mangled on trapped survivors.

    • Mangled increases time required to heal by 25% and lasts until fully healed.

ADDON_trap_StitchedBag.Name: Tension Spring
ADDON_trap_StitchedBag.Description:
A high tension spring that snaps back into place after being stretched.
  • A Bear Trap resets 2 seconds after a Survivor escapes from it.

ADDON_trap_TrapSetters.Name: Coffee Grounds
ADDON_trap_TrapSetters.Description:
An old rusted can containing damp coffee grounds.
  • Gain a 5% Haste status effect for 5 seconds after setting a Bear Trap.

    • Haste increases Killer movement speed.

Addon_Beartrap_TrapperSack.Name: Bear Oil
Addon_Beartrap_TrapperSack.Description:
Melted animal fat that can lubricate the Bear Trap's squeaky joints.
  • Setting a Bear Trap is silent.

Addon_Beartrap_001.Name: Honing Stone
Addon_Beartrap_001.Description:
When used with the Bear Trap, the honing stone sharpens its blades. The razor sharp blades inflicts deep wounds aimed at bleeding the victim as fast as possible.
  • The trapped victim is left dying instead of injured if they free themselves.

Addon_Beartrap_002.Name: Serrated Jaws
Addon_Beartrap_002.Description:
These replacement Bear Trap jaws have saw like blades which cause awful open wounds when they snap.
  • Bear Traps inflict Hemorrhage on trapped Survivors until they are healed.

    • Hemorrhage increases blood trails left by injured Survivors.

    "Like a predatory beast, it can smell and track blood."

Addon_Beartrap_003.Name: Trapper Bag
Addon_Beartrap_003.Description:
A cured leather waist bag. Large and sturdy to transport hunting equipment.
  • Start with 1 extra Bear Trap.
  • Allows the transportation of 1 extra Bear Trap.

Addon_Beartrap_004.Name: Wax Brick
Addon_Beartrap_004.Description:
A block of wax used to lower friction and facilitate movement in mechanical parts.
  • Increases the time required to rescue a Survivor or attempt escape from a Bear Trap by 33%.

Addon_Beartrap_005.Name: Lengthened Jaws
Addon_Beartrap_005.Description:
Jaws with long teeth that dig further into the flesh than a conventional Bear Trap.
  • When Survivors escape Bear Traps, they are inflicted with Deep Wound.

    • Deep Wound will put a Survivor in the dying state unless it is mended before the timer runs out.

Addon_Beartrap_006.Name: Tar Bottle
Addon_Beartrap_006.Description:
A black, matte and sticky substance similar to tar. When applied to Bear Traps, makes them far less noticeable.
  • Darkens the appearance of Bear Traps.

Addon_Beartrap_007.Name: Makeshift Wrap
Addon_Beartrap_007.Description:
A scratched and worn brace made of thick, cured animal skin.
  • The Trapper cannot be caught in his Bear Traps.
  • Bear Traps will be disarmed if The Trapper steps on them.

Addon_Beartrap_008.Name: 4-Coil Spring Kit
Addon_Beartrap_008.Description:
A replacement kit for Bear Traps which changes the usual dual spring system with 4 coil springs adding a great amount of strength to the traps' hold.
  • Increases time required for Survivors to disarm Bear Traps by 33%.

Addon_Beartrap_009.Name: Trapper Sack
Addon_Beartrap_009.Description:
A crude leather sack suitable for foraging.
  • All Bear Traps are carried at the beginning of the Trial instead of spawning on the map.
  • Bear Traps cannot be picked up.

Addon_Beartrap_010.Name: Trapper Gloves
Addon_Beartrap_010.Description:
Protective padded leather gloves.
  • Increases Bear Trap setting speed by 30%.

Addon_Beartrap_011.Name: Secondary Coil
Addon_Beartrap_011.Description:
A secondary coil which keeps a Bear Trap effective in times when the primary coils becomes unusable.
  • Increases time required for Survivors to disarm Bear Traps by 50%.

Addon_Beartrap_012.Name: Fastening Tools
Addon_Beartrap_012.Description:
A specialized set of tools used to fasten Bear Traps to ensure their effectiveness.
  • Increases Bear Trap setting speed by 50%.
  • Increases the time required to rescue a Survivor or attempt escape from a Bear Trap by 25%.

Addon_Beartrap_PaddedJaws.Name: Padded Jaws
Addon_Beartrap_PaddedJaws.Description:
These padded jaws are meant to restrain, not to wound.
  • Bear Traps do not inflict damage on trapped Survivors. Equipping this add-on negates the effects of Rusted Jaws and Serrated Jaws.
  • Points awarded for trapping Survivors are increased by 100%.

Addon_Bell_001.Name: Bone Clapper
Addon_Bell_001.Description:
A bell clapper made from a highly polished piece of bone. Causes the sounds of the Wailing Bell to echo and warp chaotically.
  • Survivors can no longer discern the Wailing Bell's distance or direction.

Addon_Bell_002.Name: "The Ghost" - Soot
Addon_Bell_002.Description:
The Khugwemuu symbol, representing the spirit world, is finger-drawn out of soot on the body of the bell.
  • After Uncloaking, the Wraith's Terror Radius and Red Stain will remain suppressed for 6 seconds.

Addon_Bell_003.Name: "The Hound" - Soot
Addon_Bell_003.Description:
The Wonnug symbol, representing a peerless tracker, is finger-drawn out of soot on the body of the bell.
  • While Cloaked, fresh blood marks are brighter than normal.

Addon_Bell_004.Name: "Blind Warrior" - Mud
Addon_Bell_004.Description:
The Baikra-Kaeug symbol, representing ferocity, is finger-drawn in mud on the body of the Bell.
  • Uncloak surprise attacks inflict Survivors with Blindness for 60 seconds.
    • Blindness prevents survivors from seeing auras.

Addon_Bell_005.Name: "Swift Hunt" - Mud
Addon_Bell_005.Description:
The Kuntin-Takkho symbol, representing rapid descent on prey, is finger-drawn in mud on the body of the Bell.
  • Increases uncloaking speed by 8%.

Addon_Bell_006.Name: "Swift Hunt" - Blood
Addon_Bell_006.Description:
The Kuntin-Takkho symbol, representing rapid descent on prey, is stamped in blood on the head of the Bell.
  • Increases uncloaking speed by 12%.

Addon_Bell_007.Name: "The Beast" - Soot
Addon_Bell_007.Description:
The Kunwulju symbol, representing the realm of fear, is finger-drawn out of soot on the body of the bell.
  • The Wraith's Terror Radius is no longer suppressed while Cloaked.
  • Bloodpoints granted for Stalking and surprise attacks are increased by 100%.

Addon_Bell_008.Name: "All Seeing" - Blood
Addon_Bell_008.Description:
The Kra-Frabai symbol, representing The Entity watching over us, is stamped in blood on the head of the Bell.
  • Unlocks hidden potential in one's aura reading ability. While Cloaked, the auras of Survivors within 8 meters are revealed to you.

Addon_Bell_009.Name: "Windstorm"- Mud
Addon_Bell_009.Description:
The Ohuwe-Onmnea symbol, representing a howling storm, is finger-drawn in mud on the body of the Bell.
  • Increases the Wraith's movement speed while cloaked by 5%.

Addon_Bell_010.Name: "Windstorm" - White
Addon_Bell_010.Description:
The Ohuwe-Onmnea symbol, representing a howling storm, is finger-drawn in white ink on the body of the Bell.
  • Increases the Wraith's movement speed while cloaked by 7%.

Addon_Bell_011.Name: "Blink" - Mud
Addon_Bell_011.Description:
The Kratin symbol, representing quick passing, is finger-drawn in mud on the body of the Bell.
  • Increases cloaking speed by 40%.

Addon_Bell_012.Name: "Blink" - White
Addon_Bell_012.Description:
The Kratin symbol, representing quick passing, is finger-drawn in white ink on the body of the Bell.
  • Increases cloaking speed by 60%.

Addon_Chainsaw_001.Name: Dad's Boots
Addon_Chainsaw_001.Description:
A pair of trusty boots, pulled from the corpse of Max Thompson Sr.
  • Increases Chainsaw Sprint turn rate by 28%.

Addon_Chainsaw_002.Name: Heavy Clutch
Addon_Chainsaw_002.Description:
A well-made clutch that keeps the chain moving smoothly.
  • Decreases the width of the Chainsaw's collision zone by 30%.

Addon_Chainsaw_003.Name: Junkyard Air Filter
Addon_Chainsaw_003.Description:
A cracked and dusty filter, it still manages to work better than the stock model.
  • Increases the Chainsaw’s overheat limit by 20%.

Addon_Chainsaw_004.Name: Punctured Muffler
Addon_Chainsaw_004.Description:
A roughly modified muffler that allows for extra air flow.
  • Increases the Chainsaw's rate of cooling by 50%.

Addon_Chainsaw_005.Name: Steel Toe Boots
Addon_Chainsaw_005.Description:
Boots with a reinforced toe that offer protection from impact.
  • Decreases recovery time after hitting an object with the Chainsaw by 12%.

Addon_Chainsaw_006.Name: Black Grease
Addon_Chainsaw_006.Description:
Thick grease that can be applied beneath the eyes to reduce glare.
  • Increases Chainsaw charge speed by 18% for 30 seconds after being blinded.

Addon_Chainsaw_007.Name: Big Buckle
Addon_Chainsaw_007.Description:
A glorious, shining belt worn by many good ol’ country boys.
  • Decreases Terror Radius by 8 meters when the Chainsaw is overheated.

Addon_Chainsaw_008.Name: Leafy Mash
Addon_Chainsaw_008.Description:
A wet mash of fragrant leaves that mask a hunter’s scent when stalking prey.
  • Gain the Undetectable status effect for 15 seconds after landing a Chainsaw hit.

    • Undetectable hides the Killer's aura, Terror Radius, and Red Stain.

Addon_Chainsaw_009.Name: Lo Pro Chains
Addon_Chainsaw_009.Description:
Light chains that decrease the weight of the Chainsaw, allowing for greater maneuverability.
  • Continue a Chainsaw Sprint after breaking a pallet or wall.
  • Survivors hit with the Chainsaw within 5 seconds of breaking a pallet or a wall are damaged for a single health state.

Addon_Chainsaw_010.Name: Mother's Helpers
Addon_Chainsaw_010.Description:
A small number of caffeine pills found in Evelyn Thompson’s purse. Side effects include nervousness and irritability.
  • Increases Chainsaw charge speed by 18% for 30 seconds after being stunned by pallet.

    • "Doctor, please, more of these." —Evelyn Thompson

Addon_Chainsaw_011.Name: Speed Limiter
Addon_Chainsaw_011.Description:
A mechanical device that limits the amount of fuel small engines can intake at one time, forcing a constant and safe speed.
  • Survivors hit with the Chainsaw are damaged for a single health state.
  • Get 100% more Bloodpoints for Chainsaw Hit score events.

Addon_Chainsaw_012.Name: Off-Brand Motor Oil
Addon_Chainsaw_012.Description:
Affordable oil that can be used to lubricate noisy chains.
  • Decreases the noise made by the Chainsaw by 30%.

Addon_HillbillyChainsaw_IridescentBrick.Name: Iridescent Brick
Addon_HillbillyChainsaw_IridescentBrick.Description:
Once representative of Max Jr’s confinement, this was the first brick to fall when his room’s barricade came crashing down.
  • After maintaining a Chainsaw Sprint for 2 seconds, grants Undetectable until the Chainsaw Sprint ends.

    • Undetectable hides the Killer's aura, Terror Radius, and Red Stain.

    "What kinda ruckus you stirrin’, boy?" — Max Thompson Sr.

Addon_Flashlight_001.Name: Battery
Addon_Flashlight_001.Description:
A standard battery of unknown brand.
  • Adds 2 seconds of use to the Flashlight.

    • "Another nearly empty battery."

Addon_Flashlight_002.Name: Heavy Duty Battery
Addon_Flashlight_002.Description:
A battery marked as "industrial strength."
  • Adds 4 seconds of use to the Flashlight.

    • "A battery advertised as "long-lasting" lasts only a few of seconds in The Black Fog."

Addon_Flashlight_003.Name: Focus Lens
Addon_Flashlight_003.Description:
A thick glass lens that focuses the Flashlight beam to increase its intensity.
  • Increases the range of the Flashlight beam by 25%.
  • Decreases the width of the Flashlight beam by 15%.
  • Increases the brightness of the Flashlight beam by 20%.
  • Increases Blindness duration by 10%.

Addon_Flashlight_004.Name: Wide Lens
Addon_Flashlight_004.Description:
A thin wide lens in perfect condition. Designed to spread the Flashlight beam at the cost of reducing its range of effectiveness.
  • Decreases the range of the Flashlight beam by 25%.
  • Increases the width of the Flashlight beam by 25%.

Addon_Flashlight_005.Name: Power Bulb
Addon_Flashlight_005.Description:
A tiny Flashlight bulb that packs more wattage for a brighter, more powerful light beam.
  • Increases the brightness of the Flashlight beam by 20%.
  • Increases Blindness duration by 10%.

    • "Even the most powerful light cannot pierce through The Black Fog's darkness."

Addon_Flashlight_006.Name: TIR Optic
Addon_Flashlight_006.Description:
A lens and reflector combo which can magnify a Flashlight's beam.
  • Increases the brightness of the Flashlight beam by 30%.
  • Increases Blindness duration by 15%.

    • "Let the light burn them out of their dark shroud."

Addon_Flashlight_007.Name: Low Amp Filament
Addon_Flashlight_007.Description:
A filament bulb designed to extend a Flashlight battery's life.
  • Decreases Flashlight battery consumption by 20%.

Addon_Flashlight_008.Name: Leather Grip
Addon_Flashlight_008.Description:
A leather strip wrapped around the Flashlight for more grip.
  • Increases the accuracy of the Flashlight beam by 20%.

    • "Too many have fallen due to sweaty hands."

Addon_Key_001.Name: Prayer Rope
Addon_Key_001.Description:
Tightly knitted rope used in praying rituals. Can be attached to the Key.
  • Adds 10 seconds of use to the Key.

    • "Pray all you want, your words are getting lost somewhere up there, in The Fog."

Addon_Key_002.Name: Prayer Beads
Addon_Key_002.Description:
A chain of matte beads of various sizes used in praying rituals. Can be attached to the Key.
  • Adds 15 seconds of use to the Key.

Addon_Key_003.Name: Eroded Token
Addon_Key_003.Description:
A heavily worn out token made of brass. If an inscription or drawing was once engraved in it, it has today completely disappeared. Can be attached to the Key using its jump ring to channel the Key's aura reading ability.
  • Reveals Survivor auras when within 24 meters.

Addon_Key_004.Name: Gold Token
Addon_Key_004.Description:
A gold token with a dull appearance. Both faces are smooth and void of any inscriptions. Can be attached to the Key using its jump ring to channel the key's aura reading ability.
  • Reveals Survivor auras when within a 48 meter range.

Addon_Key_005.Name: Blood Amber
Addon_Key_005.Description:
A blood-red amber striped with black veins. The amber is warm to the touch. Can be attached to the Key using its jump ring to channel the key's aura reading ability.
  • Reveals the Killer's aura within a 32 meter range.
  • Increases the Key's energy usage by 100%.

Addon_Key_006.Name: Milky Glass
Addon_Key_006.Description:
This opaque piece of glass emits a dull vibrating noise. When the Key is used to unlock the Hatch, the glass token protects the Key from breaking, channeling The Fog's energy into the glass.
  • Do not lose the Key when unlocking the Hatch, lose this add-on instead.

Addon_Key_007.Name: Weaved Ring
Addon_Key_007.Description:
A mundane key ring in appearance with an unusual bluish dark sheen. The ring binds the Key to the user, preventing its loss even in the darkest of times.
  • Do not lose the Key on death, lose this add-on instead.

Addon_Key_008.Name: Scratched Pearl
Addon_Key_008.Description:
A porous and scratched white pearl. A minuscule jump ring allows the pearl to be attached to the Key.
  • Increases the range of the Key's aura reading ability by 12 meters.

Addon_Key_WeddingRing.Name: Unique Wedding Ring
Addon_Key_WeddingRing.Description:
An engraved wedding ring that emerged from The Fog and resonates with an indescribable and incomprehensible energy.
  • Reveals the Obsession's aura at all times, without the need to channel the Key's energy.
  • Decreases your chances to be The Killer’s Obsession.

Addon_Map_001.Name: Map Addendum
Addon_Map_001.Description:
A fragmented piece of a thick fibrous material. A partial and faded Map is drawn on it which by itself is useless.
  • Adds a 5 second charge to any Map.

Addon_Map_002.Name: Retardant Jelly
Addon_Map_002.Description:
A slimy, translucent substance with a ghastly lavender shade. This jelly from unknown origin is highly resistant to heat.
  • Slows down the burning rate of the Map by 20%.

Addon_Map_003.Name: Glass Bead
Addon_Map_003.Description:
A strange bead circled with gold that can be used to magnify the Map and mark a specific position. The bead emits an energy which can be felt and seen by Survivors.
  • Unlocks the marker ability on the Secondary Action button.
  • Creates a marker that can be seen by all Survivors.

Addon_Map_004.Name: Crystal Bead
Addon_Map_004.Description:
An intricate set of lenses wrapped up in an astonishingly complex apparatus. The gears controlling the lenses' focus move by themselves as to focus on something invisible to humans.
  • Every Survivor sees the aura generated by the Map when the owner activates it.

Addon_Map_005.Name: Odd Stamp
Addon_Map_005.Description:
A stamp carved out of sturdy blonde wood. The text found at the base is incomprehensible: "kw'zvre'od". Can be used with a Map.
  • Increases the range of the Map tracking ability by 12 meters.

Addon_Map_006.Name: Unusual Stamp
Addon_Map_006.Description:
A wooden stamp with a crosshatched rubber pad used to mark documents. It is unclear as to how or by whom this stamp was originally used. Can be used with a Map.
  • Increases the range of the Map tracking ability by 8 meters.

Addon_Map_007.Name: Black Silk Cord
Addon_Map_007.Description:
A smooth black cord with a soft appearance. Can be tied around a Map to enhance its aura reading ability.
  • Unlocks the ability to track the Hatch.

Addon_Map_008.Name: Red Twine
Addon_Map_008.Description:
A bristly and rough piece of twine of a deep red color. Can be tied around a Map to enhance its aura reading ability.
  • Unlocks the ability to track the Killer's belongings.

Addon_Map_009.Name: Yellow Wire
Addon_Map_009.Description:
A small electrical wire. Both ends are heavily damaged like it has been forcefully torn out of its intended location. Can be tied around a Map to enhance its aura reading ability.
  • Unlocks the ability to track exit gates.

Addon_Medkit_001.Name: Bandages
Addon_Medkit_001.Description:
A pack of bandages usually found in first aid kits.
  • Adds 8 charges to the Med-kit.

Addon_Medkit_002.Name: Gel Dressings
Addon_Medkit_002.Description:
A pack of gel forming pads used to patch up heavily exudating wounds.
  • Adds 16 charges to the Med-kit.

Addon_Medkit_003.Name: Medical Scissors
Addon_Medkit_003.Description:
Scissors designed to easily cut through textiles.
  • Increases healing speed by 15%.

Addon_Medkit_004.Name: Butterfly Tape
Addon_Medkit_004.Description:
Medical quality tape used to close small wounds.
  • Increases healing speed by 5%.

Addon_Medkit_005.Name: Sponge
Addon_Medkit_005.Description:
A mundane sponge used to soak up extra blood, providing easier access to wounds.
  • Increases progression bonus for succeeding Great Skill Checks by 5%.

Addon_Medkit_006.Name: Rubber Gloves
Addon_Medkit_006.Description:
Disposable medical gloves to avoid cross-contamination.
  • Increases progression bonus for succeeding Great Skill Checks by 3%.

Addon_Medkit_007.Name: Styptic Agent
Addon_Medkit_007.Description:
A white powder with coagulant properties. Apply the agent to a wound to stop it from hemorrhaging.
  • Press the Secondary Action button while healing with the Med-kit to use the Styptic Agent.
  • When the Styptic Agent is used on an injured Survivor, they gain Endurance for 8 seconds.
  • Consumes the Med-kit on use.

    • Endurance prevents a Survivor from being downed, inflicting Deep Wound instead.
    Deep Wound will put a Survivor in the dying state unless it is mended before the timer runs out.

Addon_Medkit_008.Name: Anti-Hemorrhagic Syringe
Addon_Medkit_008.Description:
An anti-hemorrhagic substance that stops the bleeding in a matter of seconds.
  • Press the Secondary Action button while healing with the Med-kit to use the Anti-Hemorrhagic Syringe.
  • The affected Survivor will gain a health state 16 seconds after use.
  • The time required is modified by perks, items and add-ons that affect Healing Speeds.
  • This effect is canceled when the affected Survivor changes health state or is picked up.
  • Consumes the Med-kit on use.

Addon_PhantomTrap_BloodiedMud.Name: Bloodied Mud
Addon_PhantomTrap_BloodiedMud.Description:
A handful of mud with veins of deep crimson. The bloody layers empower the mud.
  • Increases Phantasm Trap trigger range by 30%.

Addon_PhantomTrap_BloodiedWater.Name: Bloodied Water
Addon_PhantomTrap_BloodiedWater.Description:
Tainted water contained in a folded waterlily leaf.
  • Increases Phantasm Trap trigger range by 20%.

Addon_PhantomTrap_BogWater.Name: Bog Water
Addon_PhantomTrap_BogWater.Description:
Murky water contained in a glass pill bottle from another time.
  • Increases Phantasm Trap trigger range by 10%.

Addon_PhantomTrap_CrackedTurtleEgg.Name: Cracked Turtle Egg
Addon_PhantomTrap_CrackedTurtleEgg.Description:
A pale orange turtle egg, cracked and emptied of its content.
  • Increases triggered Phantasm Trap duration by 35%.

Addon_PhantomTrap_CypressNecklet.Name: Cypress Necklet
Addon_PhantomTrap_CypressNecklet.Description:
A rigid ornament worn around the neck made from dead plants adorned with crudely attached cypress bark and swamp moss.
  • Increases Phantasm Trap setting speed by 20%.

Addon_PhantomTrap_DeadFlyMud.Name: Dead Fly Mud
Addon_PhantomTrap_DeadFlyMud.Description:
A small lump of mud, black with the remains of flies. Devoured to increase stamina.
  • Increases teleportation range by 20%.

Addon_PhantomTrap_DisfiguredEar.Name: Disfigured Ear
Addon_PhantomTrap_DisfiguredEar.Description:
The cannibal village deaf boy's ear. Deformed due to several hits to the head. The trapped life essence within unlocks tremendous potential in The Hag's power.
  • Survivors who trigger a Phantasm Trap will be deafened for 6 seconds.

Addon_PhantomTrap_DragonflyWings.Name: Dragonfly Wings
Addon_PhantomTrap_DragonflyWings.Description:
A handful of yellowish wings, dry and crisp. Devoured to increase stamina.
  • Increases teleportation range by 25%.

Addon_PhantomTrap_DriedCicada.Name: Dried Cicada
Addon_PhantomTrap_DriedCicada.Description:
A large swamp cicada covered in a fine layer of ash. Crispy. Devoured to increase stamina.
  • Increases teleportation range by 30%.

Addon_PhantomTrap_GranmasHeart.Name: Granma's Heart
Addon_PhantomTrap_GranmasHeart.Description:
The cold heart of the cannibal village elder. The trapped life essence within unlocks tremendous potential in The Hag's power.
  • Decreases Terror Radius to 0 meters when a Survivor triggers a Phantasm Trap.
  • Increases Mud Phantasms' Terror Radius by 16 meters.

    • "Bring me another slice of the girl." -Grandma

Addon_PhantomTrap_HalfEggshell.Name: Half Eggshell
Addon_PhantomTrap_HalfEggshell.Description:
One half of a perfectly round hollow eggshell.
  • Increases triggered Phantasm Trap duration by 30%.

Addon_PhantomTrap_MintRag.Name: Mint Rag
Addon_PhantomTrap_MintRag.Description:
A small piece of cotton torn from the dress worn by Lisa Sherwood on the day she disappeared. The trapped life essence within unlocks tremendous potential in The Hag's power.
  • The Hag can teleport to any Phantasm Trap in the level.
  • Phantasm Trap teleport gains a cooldown of 15 seconds.

Addon_PhantomTrap_PowderedEggshell.Name: Powdered Eggshell
Addon_PhantomTrap_PowderedEggshell.Description:
Minuscule eggshell fragments shimmering with a pale golden hue.
  • Increases triggered Phantasm Trap duration by 25%.

Addon_PhantomTrap_PussyWillowCatkins.Name: Pussy Willow Catkins
Addon_PhantomTrap_PussyWillowCatkins.Description:
A handful of small, pristine flower clusters covered in a fine greyish fur.
  • Reveals the Survivor's aura for 3 seconds when they trigger a Phantasm Trap.

Addon_PhantomTrap_RopeNecklet.Name: Rope Necklet
Addon_PhantomTrap_RopeNecklet.Description:
A rigid ornament worn around the neck made from dead plants.
  • Increases Phantasm Trap setting speed by 15%.

Addon_PhantomTrap_RustyShackles.Name: Rusty Shackles
Addon_PhantomTrap_RustyShackles.Description:
Shackles once used to hold prisoners and carcasses in the cannibal village cellar. The trapped life essence within unlocks tremendous potential in The Hag's power.
  • Triggered Phantasm Traps give no indication of being triggered to Survivors and do not spawn a Mud Phantasm.

Addon_PhantomTrap_ScarredHand.Name: Scarred Hand
Addon_PhantomTrap_ScarredHand.Description:
The cut up, severed hand of the cannibal village butcher. The trapped life essence within unlocks tremendous potential in The Hag's power.
  • Mud Phantasms become solid and will block Survivors.
  • Removes the ability to teleport to traps.
  • Grants 300% bonus Deviousness Bloodpoints.

    • "…" -The Butcher

Addon_PhantomTrap_SwampOrchidNecklet.Name: Swamp Orchid Necklet
Addon_PhantomTrap_SwampOrchidNecklet.Description:
A rigid ornament worn around the neck made from dead plants adorned with withered orchid petals and leaves.
  • Increases Phantasm Trap setting speed by 25%.

Addon_PhantomTrap_WaterloggedShoe.Name: Waterlogged Shoe
Addon_PhantomTrap_WaterloggedShoe.Description:
A child's shoe, long lost in the bog's waters. The trapped life essence within unlocks tremendous potential in The Hag's power.
  • Survivors in the trigger zone of a triggered Phantasm Trap are Hindered by 9%.
  • Increases movement speed by 4.5%.
  • Removes the ability to teleport to traps.

    • Hindered reduces Survivor movement speed.

Addon_PhantomTrap_WillowWreath.Name: Willow Wreath
Addon_PhantomTrap_WillowWreath.Description:
Three frail willow branches attached to form a triangular wreath.
  • Reveals the Survivor's aura for 5 seconds when they trigger a Phantasm Trap.

Addon_Toolbox_001.Name: Scraps
Addon_Toolbox_001.Description:
Springs, screws and gears. Mostly unusable junk.
  • Adds 8 charges to the Toolbox.

Addon_Toolbox_002.Name: Wire Spool
Addon_Toolbox_002.Description:
A portable but heavy spool of copper wire.
  • Adds 12 charges to the Toolbox.

Addon_Toolbox_003.Name: Clean Rag
Addon_Toolbox_003.Description:
A mundane rag. Suspiciously clean.
  • Increases the Toolbox's repair speed by 20%.

Addon_Toolbox_004.Name: Grip Wrench
Addon_Toolbox_004.Description:
An adjustable wrench with a tough grip. Essential in any Toolbox.
  • Hooks sabotaged using the Toolbox take an extra 15 seconds to respawn.

Addon_Toolbox_005.Name: Hacksaw
Addon_Toolbox_005.Description:
A small hand saw mounted with a metal cutting blade.
  • Increases the Toolbox's sabotage speed by 20%.

Addon_Toolbox_006.Name: Protective Gloves
Addon_Toolbox_006.Description:
Thick gloves which reduce manual dexterity but protect hands from injury.
  • Prevents the Killer from being notified when sabotaging a hook with the Toolbox.

Addon_Toolbox_007.Name: Brand New Part
Addon_Toolbox_007.Description:
This intricate mechanical part feels oddly out of place. It is clean and shiny as if straight out of the factory.
  • Toolbox Repair action is replaced with Install Brand New Part.
  • Installing the Brand New Part will automatically repair 15% of a generator over 5 seconds.
  • During the installation, you will be faced with 2 difficult Skill Checks.
  • Successfully hitting a Skill Check will result in an additional 5% generator repair progress, up to a total of 25% generator repair progress.
  • This add-on is consumed after use.

Addon_Toolbox_008.Name: Instructions
Addon_Toolbox_008.Description:
Someone quickly painted what seems to be repair instructions on this piece of bark.
  • Eliminates Skill Checks while repairing with the Toolbox.

Addon_K22Power_1.Name: Cat Figurine
Addon_K22Power_1.Description:
A wooden figure that had caught young Victor's eye. He shrieked until his mother stole it from the market, nearly blowing their cover.
  • Displays the target location of a Pounce.

Addon_K22Power_2.Name: Tiny Fingernail
Addon_K22Power_2.Description:
Charlotte had many ways to mourn Victor’s death. As the fingernails loosened from his rotting hands, she took one in remembrance.
  • Decreases Victor's Unbind time by 0.5 seconds.

Addon_K22Power_3.Name: Soured Milk
Addon_K22Power_3.Description:
A metal bottle filled with milk that has since soured. Loud as Victor could be, he quieted down when presented with his meal.
  • Increases Victor's alert range by 2 meters.

Addon_K22Power_4.Name: Toy Sword
Addon_K22Power_4.Description:
A miniscule toy sword, only a few inches long. Holding it brought out a violent enthusiasm in Victor.
  • Decreases Pounce charge time by 0.2 seconds.

Addon_K22Power_5.Name: Cat’s Eye
Addon_K22Power_5.Description:
An eyeball that belonged to a cat eaten by the starving Deshayes’ family. Victor hid it from his mother, using it as a toy.
  • Victor becomes silent while Pounce is fully charged.

Addon_K22Power_6.Name: Madeleine’s Glove
Addon_K22Power_6.Description:
A glove once owned by The Twins’ mother. During desperate times, it was held over Victor’s mouth to keep him from making a peep.
  • Increases Victor's alert range by 4 meters.

Addon_K22Power_7.Name: Bloody Black Hood
Addon_K22Power_7.Description:
A hood from one of the men that hunted Charlotte. Soon, he became the prey.
  • Decreases Charlotte's waking time by 0.5 seconds.

Addon_K22Power_8.Name: Ceremonial Candelabrum
Addon_K22Power_8.Description:
The candelabrum that Victor tipped over, causing his captors to burn. A symbol of his tenacity.
  • Increases time to crush Victor when he is dormant by 0.2 seconds.

Addon_K22Power_9.Name: Baby Teeth
Addon_K22Power_9.Description:
Two teeth that Victor lost long ago. They’re unusually sharp.
  • Crushing Victor when attached inflicts Blindness for 30 seconds.

    • Blindness prevents Survivors from seeing auras.

Addon_K22Power_10.Name: Rusted Needle
Addon_K22Power_10.Description:
A needle Madeleine used to sew up her children’s tattered clothes.
  • Crushing Victor when attached inflicts Hemorrhage until healed.

    • Hemorrhage increases blood trails left by injured Survivors.

Addon_K22Power_11.Name: Sewer Sludge
Addon_K22Power_11.Description:
A disgusting, sticky mixture that covered the Deshayes during an escape attempt through the city sewers.
  • Increases time to crush Victor when attached by 2 seconds.

Addon_K22Power_12.Name: Madeleine’s Scarf
Addon_K22Power_12.Description:
A cloth Madeleine wore shortly before her death. The Twins kept it as a memento.
  • Increases Victor's movement speed by 0.3 m/s.

    • "...shall hereby be recorded as a service to the greater good and the extermination of evil." — Inquiry into the death of Madeleine Deshayes

Addon_K22Power_13.Name: Stale Biscuit
Addon_K22Power_13.Description:
A hard, unleavened biscuit that Madeleine stole from a town’s market. It wasn’t much, but it was better than most meals.
  • Decreases Pounce cooldown by 0.4 seconds.

Addon_K22Power_14.Name: Weighty Rattle
Addon_K22Power_14.Description:
A shoddily carved rattle that Victor cried over until his mother stole it for him. It’s entirely too heavy to be trusted to a child.
  • Crushing Victor when attached inflicts Broken for 20 seconds.

    • Broken prevents Survivors from being healed.

Addon_K22Power_15.Name: Forest Stew
Addon_K22Power_15.Description:
A stew of foraged vegetables mixed with moss and bark to create a false sense of fullness.
  • Increases Victor's movement speed by 0.6 m/s.

    • "Eat... eat, child. You’ll feel better when it’s down." — Madeleine Deshayes

Addon_K22Power_16.Name: Spinning Top
Addon_K22Power_16.Description:
A wooden top shared between The Twins, though Victor wanted it for his own. He learned he could get what he wanted if he clung tightly and screamed.
  • Victor's Pounce causes Survivors to drop their carried items.

    • "Hush... hush... it is yours then." — Charlotte Deshayes

Addon_K22Power_17.Name: Drop of Perfume
Addon_K22Power_17.Description:
One of the few luxuries Madeleine escaped her past life with. It has a pleasant, disarming scent.
  • Survivors in Victor's alert range while he is dormant are inflicted with Oblivious.

    • Oblivious prevents Survivors from hearing or being affected by the Killer's Terror Radius.

    "Beware the deceit of witches, for they exploit the goodness in men’s hearts." — A History of Witches and Demons (1602)

Addon_K22Power_18.Name: Victor’s Soldier
Addon_K22Power_18.Description:
A toy soldier Victor clung to when scared. Something about it evoked jealousy in Charlotte.
  • Crushing Victor while he is dormant reveals the Survivor's aura for 6 seconds.

    • "Kch--kch—k’ull bawd mennn..." — Victor Deshayes

Addon_K22Power_19.Name: Silencing Cloth
Addon_K22Power_19.Description:
A coarse strip of cloth that a five-year-old Charlotte would put in her mouth. Stopped her from screaming when witch hunters were nearby.
  • Charlotte gains Undetectable for 20 seconds after waking from her dormant state.

    • Undetectable hides the Killer's aura, Terror Radius, and Red stain.

    "I don’t like this game anymore, Mother..." — Charlotte Deshayes

Addon_K22Power_20.Name: Iridescent Pendant
Addon_K22Power_20.Description:
A glass-like pendant molded from The Fog itself. There’s a portrait of Madeleine Deshayes upon it, though something about her depiction seems unsettling.
  • Crushing Victor while he is dormant inflicts Exposed for 45 seconds.

    • Exposed Survivors will be downed by basic attacks even if uninjured.

    "Your binding is no curse, my loves. It is your strength to draw upon." — Madeleine Deshayes

ADDON_LFChainsaw_ChainsawFile.Name: Chainsaw File
ADDON_LFChainsaw_ChainsawFile.Description:
A file whose purpose is to hone Chainsaw chains.
  • Decreases tantrum duration by 0.5 seconds.

ADDON_LFChainsaw_SparkPlug.Name: Spark Plug
ADDON_LFChainsaw_SparkPlug.Description:
A clean spark plug fitted for a Chainsaw.
  • Decreases time required to replenish a charge by 0.5 seconds.

ADDON_LFChainsaw_VegetableOil.Name: Vegetable Oil
ADDON_LFChainsaw_VegetableOil.Description:
A rancid oil used as a poor quality lubricant.
  • Decreases Chainsaw cooldown by 0.3 seconds.

ADDON_LFChainsaw_PrimerBulb.Name: Primer Bulb
ADDON_LFChainsaw_PrimerBulb.Description:
Pumps more gas in the ignition system to ensure a quick and powerful start.
  • Decreases time required to replenish a charge by 1 second.

ADDON_LFChainsaw_LongGuideBar.Name: Long Guide Bar
ADDON_LFChainsaw_LongGuideBar.Description:
A sturdy iron replacement bar for long chains.
  • Increases the time the Chainsaw can be revved before triggering a tantrum by 2 seconds.

ADDON_LFChainsaw_DepthGaugeRake.Name: Depth Gauge Rake
ADDON_LFChainsaw_DepthGaugeRake.Description:
Tool that increases the angle of the depth gauge, making the chain eat more "wood".
  • Grants 1 additional Chainsaw charge.
  • Increases time required to charge the Chainsaw by 22%.
  • Decreases Chainsaw Sweep movement speed by 2%.

ADDON_LFChainsaw_HomemadeMuffler.Name: Homemade Muffler
ADDON_LFChainsaw_HomemadeMuffler.Description:
A makeshift exhaust system made of black gas pipes.
  • Decreases tantrum duration by 1 second.

ADDON_LFChainsaw_GrislyChains.Name: Grisly Chain
ADDON_LFChainsaw_GrislyChains.Description:
A chain with unusually hefty cutter teeth that leaves victims crippled even after being healed.
  • Chainsaw hits inflict Mangled.

    • Mangled increases time required to heal by 25% and lasts until fully healed.

ADDON_LFChainsaw_SpeedLimiter.Name: Speed Limiter
ADDON_LFChainsaw_SpeedLimiter.Description:
A mechanical device that limits the amount of fuel small engines can intake at one time, forcing a constant and safe speed.
  • Chainsaw does not automatically trigger dying state.
  • Get 100% more Bloodpoints for Chainsaw Hit score events.

ADDON_LFChainsaw_ShopLubricant.Name: Shop Lubricant
ADDON_LFChainsaw_ShopLubricant.Description:
An oil specifically formulated for chainsaws. A special additive prevents oil throw off.
  • Downing a Survivor with the Chainsaw while no other Survivors are in your Terror Radius will hide the Survivor's aura for 20 seconds.

ADDON_LFChainsaw_KnifeScratches.Name: Knife Scratches
ADDON_LFChainsaw_KnifeScratches.Description:
Scratches cover the Chainsaw's body, caused by a searing blade. Memories of reprimands fill its holder with the fear of failure.
  • Increases Chainsaw Sweep movement speed by 2%.
  • Increases time required to charge the Chainsaw by 14%.

ADDON_LFChainsaw_Chili.Name: Chili
ADDON_LFChainsaw_Chili.Description:
A big bowl of steaming chili to keep you fresh and strong.
  • Increases maximum Chainsaw Sweep duration by 0.25 seconds per charge spent.

    • "I got some good barbecue here! " -Drayton Sawyer

ADDON_LFChainsaw_BeastsMarks.Name: The Beast's Marks
ADDON_LFChainsaw_BeastsMarks.Description:
Jagged marks cover the Chainsaw's body, punishment from the dark beast that lives in The Fog. Memories of violent reprimands fill its holder with the fear of failure.
  • Increases Chainsaw Sweep movement speed by 3%.
  • Increases time required to charge the Chainsaw by 14%.

ADDON_LFChainsaw_CarburatorGuide.Name: Carburetor Tuning Guide
ADDON_LFChainsaw_CarburatorGuide.Description:
A crudely drawn guide to properly adjust and tune a Chainsaw carburetor.
  • Automatically consume all charges when triggering a Chainsaw Sweep.
  • Increases Chainsaw Sweep duration by 0.5 seconds.
  • Decreases Chainsaw Sweep movement speed by 2%.

ADDON_LFChainsaw_LightChassis.Name: Light Chassis
ADDON_LFChainsaw_LightChassis.Description:
A light and durable Chainsaw chassis with a shorter guide bar. Makes the Chainsaw easier to handle.
  • While revving, see the auras of Survivors within 8 meters.

ADDON_LFChainsaw_TheGrease.Name: The Grease
ADDON_LFChainsaw_TheGrease.Description:
A thick yellowish ooze, concocted by the Sawyers. Used for all-purpose lubrication around their house.
  • Increases the time the Chainsaw can be revved before triggering a tantrum by 3 seconds.

ADDON_LFChainsaw_RustedChain.Name: Rusted Chain
ADDON_LFChainsaw_RustedChain.Description:
This chain is covered with crusty and volatile rust spots that make injuries particularly difficult to heal.
  • Chainsaw hits inflict Broken for 90 seconds.

    • Broken prevents Survivors from being healed.

ADDON_LFChainsaw_AwardWinningChili.Name: Award-Winning Chili
ADDON_LFChainsaw_AwardWinningChili.Description:
A big bowl of spicy chili made famous thanks to prime meat.
  • Increases maximum Chainsaw Sweep duration by 0.5 seconds per charge spent.

    • "The secret's in the meat." -Drayton Sawyer

ADDON_LFChainsaw_BegrimedChain.Name: Begrimed Chains
ADDON_LFChainsaw_BegrimedChain.Description:
This chain is stained with a foul substance that debilitates anyone it touches.
  • Chainsaw hits cause Survivors to drop their items.

ADDON_LFChainsaw_IridescentFlesh.Name: Iridescent Flesh
ADDON_LFChainsaw_IridescentFlesh.Description:
A thin slice of smooth, young flesh. The veins shimmer with luminescent glow, as if life still flows within.
  • Hitting a Survivor with the Chainsaw replenishes its charges.
  • Limits the maximum tantrum duration to 5 seconds.

    • "There are moments when we cannot believe that what is happening is really true. Pinch yourself and you may find out that it is." — Pam Jones

Addon_Trickster_01.Name: Memento Blades
Addon_Trickster_01.Description:
Blood-rusted knives, worn from overuse. Employed during Ji-Woon's early murders, they hold a place of importance in his heart.
  • Increases number of Blade hits required for maximum Laceration by 1.
  • Gain 100% bonus Bloodpoints for Showstopper score events.

Addon_Trickster_02.Name: Trick Pouch
Addon_Trickster_02.Description:
A pouch with a number of hidden pockets. Used by aspiring magicians and those with something to hide.
  • Increases maximum carried Blades by 4.
  • Start the Trial with 4 additional Blades.

Addon_Trickster_03.Name: Killing Part Chords
Addon_Trickster_03.Description:
A set of chords that Ji-Woon never found a song for. Still, the sound is undeniably catchy.
  • Increases movement speed while throwing Blades by 1%.

Addon_Trickster_04.Name: Inferno Wires
Addon_Trickster_04.Description:
Burnt wires from the studio fire that killed four of the five NO SPIN members. Their deaths gave rise to The Trickster.
  • Increases duration of Main Event by 25%.

Addon_Trickster_05.Name: Ji-Woon's Autograph
Addon_Trickster_05.Description:
A signature from the celebrity known as The Trickster. Sore as his wrist was after hundreds of these, it was invigorating to know he was so in demand.
  • Decreases the number of Blades required to reach maximum throw rate by 1.

Addon_Trickster_06.Name: On Target Single
Addon_Trickster_06.Description:
An underground single produced by Ji-Woon before achieving fame. Only the biggest NO SPIN fans collected this hidden gem.
  • Increases time before Laceration starts decaying by 1 seconds.

Addon_Trickster_07.Name: Lucky Blade
Addon_Trickster_07.Description:
The first throwing knife Ji-Woon ever owned. Purchased by his father, he was expected to put on a show for those frequenting the family restaurant.
  • Increases the duration of Main Event by 0.2 seconds for each Blade hit while it is active.

Addon_Trickster_08.Name: Caged Heart Shoes
Addon_Trickster_08.Description:
Shoes that Ji-Woon wore during the music video for One Caged Heart. Allows for smooth, graceful movements of the point dance.
  • Increases movement speed while throwing Blades by 2.5%.

Addon_Trickster_09.Name: Tequila Moonrock
Addon_Trickster_09.Description:
A drink invented in a modest Changwon bar. Became a favorite of Ji-Woon's.
  • Increases duration of Main Event by 50%.

Addon_Trickster_10.Name: Bloody Boa
Addon_Trickster_10.Description:
A boa that Ji-Woon draped around a victim’s slashed neck. A number of pockets are concealed within it.
  • Increases the maximum carried Blades by 8.
  • Start the Trial with 8 additional Blades.

Addon_Trickster_11.Name: Fizz-Spin Soda
Addon_Trickster_11.Description:
A limited edition can of soda promoting NO SPIN. High sugar and caffeine content.
  • Decreases the number of Blades required to reach maximum throw rate by 2.

Addon_Trickster_12.Name: Waiting for You Watch
Addon_Trickster_12.Description:
A pocket watch worn by Ji-Woon during a live performance of I’ll Be Waiting for You. It’s a stage prop that doesn’t work and never will.
  • Increases the duration of Main Event by 0.3 seconds for each Blade hit while it is active.

    • “Don’t run away
    Don’t say we’re through
    No way to escape this
    I’ll be waiting for you”
    — NO SPIN’s “I’ll Be Waiting for You”

Addon_Trickster_13.Name: Ripper Brace
Addon_Trickster_13.Description:
A wrist brace worn by Ji-Woon during the filming of his music video Ripper. Though unintentional, the design stabilizes the wrist better than many medical braces.
  • Increases time before Laceration starts decaying by 3 seconds.

Addon_Trickster_14.Name: Melodious Murder
Addon_Trickster_14.Description:
An audio file of victims’ crisp, clear shrieks. Ji-Woon incorporated the sounds into one of his more popular tracks.
  • Increases Blade reload speed at lockers by 25%.

Addon_Trickster_15.Name: Diamond Cufflinks
Addon_Trickster_15.Description:
Cufflinks gouged into the eyes of a sasaeng fan who made the mistake of stalking Ji-Woon. Rubbing off the blood, there’s so much to be seen in the glitter.
  • Reveals Survivor auras for 6 seconds when their Laceration reaches one Blade hit from maximum.

    • “Shhh... You don’t have to see your blood anymore.” —Ji-Woon Hak

Addon_Trickster_16.Name: Edge of Revival Album
Addon_Trickster_16.Description:
The Trickster’s debut album. The coarse and vicious tone was met with a mixed reaction from fans despite critical acclaim.
  • Blades shatter when hitting the environment, dealing 50% Laceration to nearby Survivors.

    • “Your whisper on me
    Warm as can be
    Burning each breath
    Till I can’t breathe”
    — The Trickster’s “Whispers of Warmth”

Addon_Trickster_17.Name: Trick Blades
Addon_Trickster_17.Description:
Specialty blades that are only seen as faulty by those who lack imagination. A young Ji-Woon dazzled spectators with the tricks he performed.
  • Blades ricochet off the environment twice.
  • Ricochet hits grant bonus Bloodpoints.

Addon_Trickster_18.Name: Cut Thru U Single
Addon_Trickster_18.Description:
The first single released by NO SPIN after Ji-Woon joined their ranks. Scored an all-kill on the Korean charts.
  • Blades pierce through Survivors.
  • Subsequent Survivors hit by the same Blade receive 50% Laceration.

    • “Can't stop this love
    That's tearing your heart
    Wherever you go
    I will cut you apart”
    — NO SPIN’s “Cut Thru U”

Addon_Trickster_19.Name: Death Throes Compilation
Addon_Trickster_19.Description:
A collection of the final sounds from Ji-Woon's victims, adapted to a vinyl record. Terrifying and emotionally raw.
  • When Main Event ends, The Trickster's Blades are replenished.

    • “Please, no... don’t make it hurt... I can’t... I...” —Unidentified Voice

Addon_Trickster_20.Name: Iridescent Photocard
Addon_Trickster_20.Description:
A glass-like photo molded from The Fog itself. Ji-Woon's eyes shimmer holographically on his grinning face.
  • When a Survivor’s Laceration Meter is two or less Blade hits away from the maximum, they are inflicted with Exposed.

    • Exposed survivors will be downed by basic attacks even if uninjured.

    “It’s okay, scream my name. Let me hear everything the pain awakens...” —Ji-Woon Hak

Addon_Stalker_BlondHair.Name: Blond Hair
Addon_Stalker_BlondHair.Description:
A single slightly wavy blond hair.
  • Increases the duration of Evil Within III by 10 seconds.
  • Increases the amount of evil required to reach Evil Within III from Evil Within II for the first time by 50%.

Addon_Stalker_BoyfriendsMemo.Name: Boyfriend's Memo
Addon_Stalker_BoyfriendsMemo.Description:
A "romantic", if slightly sleazy, note left around to draw the attention of a female lover.
  • Increases the range of The Shape's lunge attack while in Evil Within I by 50%.

    • "The note is signed: D."

Addon_Stalker_DeadRabbit.Name: Dead Rabbit
Addon_Stalker_DeadRabbit.Description:
A grey rabbit which has been opened from neck to tail.
  • Decreases Terror Radius in Evil Within II by 25%.
  • Increases Terror Radius in Evil Within III by 25%.

Addon_Stalker_FragrantTuftOfHair.Name: Fragrant Tuft of Hair
Addon_Stalker_FragrantTuftOfHair.Description:
A tuft of blond hair which was forcefully torn off someone's scalp. Releases hints of feminine floral fragrance.
  • Unlimited duration of Evil Within III.
  • Increases the amount of evil required to reach Evil Within III from Evil Within II by 200%.

Addon_Stalker_GlassFragment.Name: Glass Fragment
Addon_Stalker_GlassFragment.Description:
A tiny piece of tinted glass, probably from a broken object. It is impossible to determine its origin.
  • Stalking a Survivor for at least 1 second while in Evil Within I reveals that Survivor's aura for 3 seconds.

Addon_Stalker_HairBow.Name: Hair Bow
Addon_Stalker_HairBow.Description:
A blue tartan ribbon used to tie hair.
  • Increases the duration of Evil Within III by 30 seconds.
  • Increases the amount of evil required to reach Evil Within III from Evil Within II for the first time by 50%.

Addon_Stalker_HairBrush.Name: Hair Brush
Addon_Stalker_HairBrush.Description:
A nylon bristle brush used to add body and softness to hair.
  • Increases the duration of Evil Within III by 20 seconds.
  • Increases the amount of evil required to reach Evil Within III from Evil Within II for the first time by 50%.

Addon_Stalker_JMyersMemorial.Name: J.Myers Memorial
Addon_Stalker_JMyersMemorial.Description:
A glossy page ripped from the '65 Haddonfield High School yearbook, one dedicated to the memory of Judith Myers.
  • Increases the rate at which evil is gained when stalking by 25%.

Addon_Stalker_Jewelry.Name: Jewelry
Addon_Stalker_Jewelry.Description:
A large necklace made of beads and inexpensive metals. One of Judith's favorites.
  • Increases movement speed while stalking by 20%.

Addon_Stalker_JewelryBox.Name: Jewelry Box
Addon_Stalker_JewelryBox.Description:
A barren wooden box in which vanity items were once stored.
  • Increases movement speed while stalking by 30%.

Addon_Stalker_JudithsJournal.Name: Judith's Journal
Addon_Stalker_JudithsJournal.Description:
A journal identified as owned by Judith M. Myers. Most of the pages are defaced with frightening and disturbing drawings.
  • You become obsessed with one Survivor.
  • Increases the rate at which evil is gained when stalking your Obsession by 40%.

Addon_Stalker_JudithsTombstone.Name: Judith's Tombstone
Addon_Stalker_JudithsTombstone.Description:
A large and heavy granite tombstone stolen from Mt. Sinclair cemetery, belonging to Judith Myers.
  • Unlocks the ability to kill healthy or injured Survivors with Evil Within III.
  • Increases the amount of evil required to reach Evil Within III from Evil Within II by 200%.
  • Decreases movement speed by 9% while Evil Within III is active.

    • "Here lies our beloved daughter."

Addon_Stalker_LockOfHair.Name: Lock of Hair
Addon_Stalker_LockOfHair.Description:
A cut lock of blond hair bunched with a black elastic.
  • Increases the duration of Evil Within III by 40 seconds.
  • Increases the amount of evil required to reach Evil Within III from Evil Within II for the first time by 100%.

Addon_Stalker_MemorialFlower.Name: Memorial Flower
Addon_Stalker_MemorialFlower.Description:
A partially faded and dried pink larkspur picked up from a gravestone.
  • Increases the rate at which evil is gained when stalking by 11%.

Addon_Stalker_MirrorShard.Name: Mirror Shard
Addon_Stalker_MirrorShard.Description:
A large and sharp piece of a broken mirror.
  • Stalking a Survivor for at least 1 second while in Evil Within II reveals that Survivor's aura for 5 seconds.

Addon_Stalker_ReflectiveFragment.Name: Reflective Fragment
Addon_Stalker_ReflectiveFragment.Description:
A tiny piece of a highly reflective material most probably from a broken mirror.
  • Stalking a Survivor for at least 1 second while in Evil Within II reveals that Survivor's aura for 2 seconds.

Addon_Stalker_ScratchedMirror.Name: Scratched Mirror
Addon_Stalker_ScratchedMirror.Description:
A standing portable vanity mirror which has been violently scratched with a sharp metallic object.
  • Evil Within I reveals Survivors' auras when stalking within a 32 meter range.
  • Evil Within cannot progress past TIER I.
  • For each Hit score event, score 100% Bloodpoints in the Brutality category and an additional 200% Bloodpoints in the Deviousness category.

Addon_Stalker_TackyEarrings.Name: Tacky Earrings
Addon_Stalker_TackyEarrings.Description:
A very cheap piece of jewelry made from plastic. Painted to resemble precious material.
  • Increases movement speed while stalking by 10%.

Addon_Stalker_TombstonePiece.Name: Tombstone Piece
Addon_Stalker_TombstonePiece.Description:
A fist-sized granite piece taken from a broken tombstone.
  • Unlocks the ability to kill healthy or injured Survivors with Evil Within III.
  • Killing a Survivor drains the power of Evil Within.
  • Increases the amount of evil required to reach Evil Within III from Evil Within II by 150%.

Addon_Stalker_VanityMirror.Name: Vanity Mirror
Addon_Stalker_VanityMirror.Description:
A standing portable vanity mirror in perfect condition except for a fine layer of dust and face powder covering it.
  • Evil Within II reveals Survivors' auras when stalking within a 16 meter range.
  • Evil Within cannot progress past TIER II.
  • For each Hit score event, grant 100% Bloodpoints in the Brutality category and an additional 150% Bloodpoints in the Deviousness category.

Addon_Spark_OrderClassI.Name: "Order" - Class I
Addon_Spark_OrderClassI.Description:
A conventional ECT procedure, part of a patient's daily routine at the Léry's Memorial Institute. Can cause a state of mild confusion in the patient.
  • Decreases Static Blast cooldown by 2 seconds.

    • Survivors with Madness suffer from the Affliction of Order:
  • Broken pallets may appear to be replaced with illusionary pallets that persist until approached.
  • A new illusionary pallet is generated at the location of a random broken pallet every 20 seconds.
  • The Doctor sees the auras of illusionary pallets.

Addon_Spark_CalmClassI.Name: "Calm" - Class I
Addon_Spark_CalmClassI.Description:
An ECT procedure using a deep wavelength that soothes various mental illness. With Carter's Spark as its source, this procedure can cause mild anxiety in the patient.
  • Increases Terror Radius by 4 meters while Static Blast is ready.
  • Decreases Terror Radius by 4 meters while Static Blast is on cooldown.

    • Survivors with Madness suffer from the Affliction of Calm:
  • Madness II: Intermittently causes Survivors to hear a distant illusionary Terror Radius.
  • Madness III: Constantly causes Survivors to hear a distant illusionary Terror Radius.

Addon_Spark_NanmuCatapult.Name: Maple Knight
Addon_Spark_NanmuCatapult.Description:
A white knight chess piece made of maple. This gift from an old man brings back distant memories and imbues The Doctor with devastating focus.
  • Reveals the area of effect of Shock Therapy.

Addon_Spark_MoldyElectrode.Name: Moldy Electrode
Addon_Spark_MoldyElectrode.Description:
A moldy electrode which nevertheless conducts a weak electrical current.
  • Increases the range of Shock Therapy by 2 meters.

Addon_Spark_OrderClassII.Name: "Order" - Class II
Addon_Spark_OrderClassII.Description:
A high stimulus ECT procedure, part of a patient daily routine at the Léry's Memorial Institute. Can cause a state of moderate confusion in the patient.
  • Decreases Static Blast cooldown by 4 seconds.

    • Survivors with Madness suffer from the Affliction of Order:
  • Broken pallets may appear to be replaced with illusionary pallets that persist until approached.
  • A new illusionary pallet is generated at the location of a random broken pallet every 20 seconds.
  • The Doctor sees the auras of illusionary pallets.

Addon_Spark_DisciplineClassII.Name: "Discipline" - Class II
Addon_Spark_DisciplineClassII.Description:
Project Awakening ECT procedure for disciplinary action which uses a fixed dose at high voltage. Can cause a state of moderate paranoia in the patient.
  • Decreases the detonation delay of Shock Therapy by 10%.

    • Survivors with Madness suffer from the Affliction of Discipline:
  • Madness II: While in a chase, Survivors perceive an illusionary Red Stain and Terror Radius as though The Doctor were directly behind them. This effect persists for 6 seconds after the chase ends.
  • Madness III: Illusionary Red Stain and Terror Radius are constantly active.
  • The Doctor also sees the illusionary Red Stain.

    • "We re-educate our patients with the greatest care." -Léry's Memorial Institute

Addon_Spark_CalmClassII.Name: "Calm" - Class II
Addon_Spark_CalmClassII.Description:
A risky ECT procedure using a deep wavelength that soothes various mental illness. With Carter's Spark as its source, this procedure can cause moderate anxiety in the patient.
  • Increases Terror Radius by 6 meters while Static Blast is ready.
  • Decreases Terror Radius by 6 meters while Static Blast is on cooldown.

    • Survivors with Madness suffer from the Affliction of Calm:
  • Madness II: Intermittently causes Survivors to hear a distant illusionary Terror Radius.
  • Madness III: Constantly causes Survivors to hear a distant illusionary Terror Radius.

    • "Electroconvulsive therapy is one of the safest medical procedures." -Léry's Memorial Institute

Addon_Spark_RestraintClassII.Name: "Restraint" - Class II
Addon_Spark_RestraintClassII.Description:
An experimental ECT procedure developed within The Fog. Uses a wavelength that links the patient's and Doctor's minds. This procedure is known to cause mild cases of hallucinations in the patient.
  • Reveals Survivors' auras for 1 second when their Madness level increases.

    • Survivors with Madness suffer from the Affliction of Restraint:
  • Increases the duration of illusionary Doctor hallucinations by 6 seconds.
  • Allows The Doctor to see the auras of hallucinations at any level of Madness.

Addon_Spark_PolishedElectrode.Name: Polished Electrode
Addon_Spark_PolishedElectrode.Description:
A like-new electrode, standard equipment to conduct electroconvulsive treatments.
  • Increases the range of Shock Therapy by 3 meters.

Addon_Spark_TigerFangCharm.Name: Interview Tape
Addon_Spark_TigerFangCharm.Description:
A compact cassette from Project Awakening containing an un-edited interview of a victim. Opens The Doctor's mind to alternate treatment methods.
  • Shock Therapy special ability changes from a cone to a beam with a 24 meter range and a 2 meter width.

Addon_Spark_DisciplineClassIII.Name: "Discipline" - Class III
Addon_Spark_DisciplineClassIII.Description:
Project Awakening ECT procedure for disciplinary action which uses a fixed dose at very high voltage. Can cause a state of serious paranoia in the patient.
  • Decreases the detonation delay of Shock Therapy by 20%.

    • Survivors with Madness suffer from the Affliction of Discipline:
  • Madness II: While in a chase, Survivors perceive an illusionary Red Stain and Terror Radius as though The Doctor were directly behind them. This effect persists for 6 seconds after the chase ends.
  • Madness III: Illusionary Red Stain and Terror Radius are constantly active.
  • The Doctor also sees the illusionary Red Stain.

    • "Respect for our patients is at the core of our principles." -Léry's Memorial Institute

Addon_Spark_RestraintClassIII.Name: "Restraint" - Class III
Addon_Spark_RestraintClassIII.Description:
An experimental ECT procedure developed within The Fog. Uses a high stimulus wavelength to link the patient's and Doctor's minds. This procedure is known to cause serious cases of hallucinations in the patient.
  • Reveals Survivors' auras for 2 seconds when their Madness level increases.

    • Survivors with Madness suffer from the Affliction of Restraint:
  • Increases the duration of illusionary Doctor hallucinations by 6 seconds.
  • Allows The Doctor to see the auras of hallucinations at any level of Madness.

Addon_Spark_HighStimulusElectrode.Name: High Stimulus Electrode
Addon_Spark_HighStimulusElectrode.Description:
An experimental electrode that can withstand very-high charges for a longer period of time.
  • Increases the range of Shock Therapy by 4 meters.

Addon_Spark_Obedience_MuYisNotes.Name: Scrapped Tape
Addon_Spark_Obedience_MuYisNotes.Description:
A compact cassette from Project Awakening containing mostly white noise. Opens The Doctor's mind to alternate treatment methods.
  • Changes the shape of Shock Therapy to a ring with a range of 8 meters, a radius of 4 meters, and a thickness of 1 meter.

Addon_Spark_OrderMuYisNotes.Name: "Order" - Carter's Notes
Addon_Spark_OrderMuYisNotes.Description:
An experimental version of the ECT procedure, annotated by Doctor Herman Carter himself. The long, constant stimulus leaves the patient in a state of severe confusion.
  • Decreases Static Blast cooldown by 6 seconds.

    • Survivors with Madness suffer from the Affliction of Order:
  • Broken pallets may appear to be replaced with illusionary pallets that persist until approached.
  • A new illusionary pallet is generated at the location of a random broken pallet every 20 seconds.
  • The Doctor sees the auras of illusionary pallets.

Addon_Spark_DisciplineMuYisNotes.Name: "Discipline" - Carter's Notes
Addon_Spark_DisciplineMuYisNotes.Description:
Project Awakening ECT procedure for disciplinary action, annotated by Doctor Herman Carter himself. The intolerably high voltage leaves the patient in a severe state of paranoia.
  • Decreases the detonation delay of Shock Therapy by 30%.

    • Survivors with Madness suffer from the Affliction of Discipline:
  • Madness II: While in a chase, Survivors perceive an illusionary Red Stain and Terror Radius as though The Doctor were directly behind them. This effect persists for 6 seconds after the chase ends.
  • Madness III: Illusionary Red Stain and Terror Radius are constantly active.
  • The Doctor also sees the illusionary Red Stain.

    • "To avoid relapse from our most tenacious subjects, use maximum levels when proceeding with disciplinary actions." -H. Carter

Addon_Spark_CalmMuYisNotes.Name: "Calm" - Carter's Notes
Addon_Spark_CalmMuYisNotes.Description:
An experimental version of the ECT procedure annotated by Doctor Herman Carter himself. Uses a deep wavelength that soothes various mental illness. With Carter's Spark as its source, this procedure causes uncontrollable fear and anxiety in the patient.
  • Increases Terror Radius by 8 meters while Static Blast is ready.
  • Decreases Terror Radius by 8 meters while Static Blast is on cooldown.

    • Survivors with Madness suffer from the Affliction of Calm:
  • Madness II: Intermittently causes Survivors to hear a distant illusionary Terror Radius.
  • Madness III: Constantly causes Survivors to hear a distant illusionary Terror Radius.

    • "Higher quality seizures trigger catatonia. At least it gives me peace for the time it lasts." -H. Carter

Addon_Spark_RestraintMuYisNotes.Name: "Restraint" - Carter's Notes
Addon_Spark_RestraintMuYisNotes.Description:
An experimental ECT procedure developed within The Fog, crudely annotated. Uses an unbearable stimulus wavelength to link the patient's and Doctor's minds. This procedure is known to cause severe cases of hallucinations in the patient.
  • Reveals Survivors' auras for 3 seconds when their Madness level increases.

    • Survivors with Madness suffer from the Affliction of Restraint:
  • Increases the duration of illusionary Doctor hallucinations by 6 seconds.
  • Allows The Doctor to see the auras of hallucinations at any level of Madness.

Addon_Spark_JadeCharm.Name: Iridescent Queen
Addon_Spark_JadeCharm.Description:
A glass-like queen chess piece molded from The Fog itself. It can't be touched without receiving a considerable jolt of electricity.
  • All Survivors struck by Shock Therapy or Static Blast acquire a lingering Static Charge. The Static Charge remains with The Survivor(s) until discharged.
  • Multiple Survivors struck by the same Shock Therapy or Static Blast that are within 4 meters of each other do not acquire a Static Charge.
  • Any time a Survivor is within 4 meters of another Survivor carrying a Static Charge, the Survivor receives a shock identical to Shock Therapy and the Static Charge is discharged immediately.

    • "Once we have established an effective method of treatment, we can focus on its efficient means of delivery." -H. Carter

Addon_Spark_IridescentGeneral.Name: Iridescent King
Addon_Spark_IridescentGeneral.Description:
A glass-like king chess piece molded from The Fog Itself. The Entity's trace reverberating within can break the most powerful minds.
Survivors with Madness status effect suffer from the following Afflictions: Calm, Discipline, Order, and Restraint.
  • Intermittently causes Survivors to hear a distant illusionary Terror Radius.
  • While in a chase, Survivors perceive an illusionary Red Stain and Terror Radius as though The Doctor were directly behind them. This effect persists for 6 seconds after the chase ends in Madness II and is constantly active in Madness III.
  • Broken pallets may appear to be replaced with illusionary pallets that persist until approached. A new illusionary pallets is generated at the location of a random broken pallet every 20 seconds.
  • Increases the duration of illusionary Doctor hallucinations by 6 seconds.
  • The Doctor sees illusionary Red Stains as well as the auras of illusionary Doctors and illusionary pallets.

    • "Gazing in the iridescent glass is plunging oneself into madness" -Unsigned Notes

Addon_Hatchet_RustyHead.Name: Rusty Head
Addon_Hatchet_RustyHead.Description:
These Hatchets' heads are covered with crusty and volatile rust spots that makes injuries particularly difficult to heal.
  • Hatchets inflict Mangled.

    • Mangled increases time required to heal by 25% and lasts until fully healed.

Addon_Hatchet_BegrimedHead.Name: Begrimed Head
Addon_Hatchet_BegrimedHead.Description:
These Hatchets' heads are stained with a foul substance that afflict anyone it touches with debilities.
  • Hit target suffers from the Mangled and Hemorrhage status effects until fully healed.

    • Hemorrhage increases blood trails left by injured Survivors.
    Mangled increases time required to heal by 25% and lasts until fully healed.

Addon_Hatchet_YewSeedBrew.Name: Wooden Fox
Addon_Hatchet_YewSeedBrew.Description:
Roughly carved, this fox statuette is no more than a few inches. A reminder that stealth and cunning is as effective as raw power.
  • Grants Undetectable for 30 seconds after reloading.

    • Undetectable hides the Killer's aura, Terror Radius, and Red Stain.

Addon_Hatchet_YewSeedConcoction.Name: Rose Root
Addon_Hatchet_YewSeedConcoction.Description:
Dried petals that relieve symptoms of fatigue and overexertion when brewed in a tea.
  • Increases thrown Hatchet speed by 20%.

Addon_Hatchet_CoarseStone.Name: Coarse Stone
Addon_Hatchet_CoarseStone.Description:
This stone is too coarse to do any good. A blade damaged by it inflicts awful open wounds.
  • Hitting a target increases the volume of their grunts of pain by 50% until healed.

Addon_Hatchet_FineStone.Name: Weighted Head
Addon_Hatchet_FineStone.Description:
An oddly weighted hatchet head, crafted to deliver a hard blow to its target. It requires a wielder with a strong arm.
  • Hatchets inflict Incapacitated for 10 seconds.

    • Incapacitated prevents Survivors from healing, repairing, sabotaging, cleansing, blessing, mending, or using items.

Addon_Hatchet_LeatherLoop.Name: Leather Loop
Addon_Hatchet_LeatherLoop.Description:
This leather strip tied into a loop can be attached to a belt to allow easy transportation of tools.
  • Start with 1 extra Hatchet.
  • Increases maximum carried Hatchet amount by 1.

Addon_Hatchet_InfantryBelt.Name: Infantry Belt
Addon_Hatchet_InfantryBelt.Description:
A sturdy utility belt pillaged from a soldier. Its multiple leather loops and holsters are useful to transport tools.
  • Start with 2 extra Hatchets.
  • Increases maximum carried Hatchet amount by 2.

Addon_Hatchet_BerusToxin.Name: Yellowed Cloth
Addon_Hatchet_BerusToxin.Description:
A simple scrap of material to tend to blisters and wipe the puss away.
  • Increases thrown hatchet speed by 10%.

Addon_Hatchet_VenomousConcoction.Name: Venomous Concoction
Addon_Hatchet_VenomousConcoction.Description:
A toxic concoction applied to the Hatchets' blade. The murky concoction is mainly composed of Berus snake venom which gives it fatiguing capabilities.
  • Hatchets inflict Exhausted for 5 seconds.

    • Exhausted prevents Survivors from activating exhausting perks.

Addon_Hatchet_IridescentHead.Name: Iridescent Head
Addon_Hatchet_IridescentHead.Description:
A glass-like Hatchet head molded from The Fog Itself. The blade is warm and reverberating with The Entity's power.
  • Successful Hatchet hits immediately put healthy Survivors into the dying state.
  • Sets maximum number of carried Hatchets to 1.

    • "The iridescent glass cuts through flesh and soul."

Addon_Hatchet_BandagedHaft.Name: Bandaged Haft
Addon_Hatchet_BandagedHaft.Description:
First-aid bandages securely rolled and attached to the Hatchets' haft.
  • Decreases Hatchet throw cooldown by 10%.

Addon_Hatchet_OakHaft.Name: Oak Haft
Addon_Hatchet_OakHaft.Description:
A polished haft which allows for a quick and sly manipulation of the deadly tool.
  • Decreases Hatchet throw cooldown by 20%.

Addon_Hatchet_DeerskinGloves.Name: Deerskin Gloves
Addon_Hatchet_DeerskinGloves.Description:
Cured leather gloves that protect the hands and give a sure grip.
  • Decreases time required to reload Hatchets at a locker by 20%.

Addon_Hatchet_ShinyPin.Name: Shiny Pin
Addon_Hatchet_ShinyPin.Description:
A copper pin defaced beyond recognition yet polished to a high sheen. Pillaged from a particularly difficult prey.
  • Increases The Huntress' movement speed by 5% while aiming or throwing a Hatchet.

Addon_Hatchet_AmanitaToxin.Name: Amanita Toxin
Addon_Hatchet_AmanitaToxin.Description:
A toxin applied to the Hatchets' blade. The Amanita mushrooms' toxin numbs the mind.
  • Hatchets inflict Blindness for 60 seconds.

    • Blindness prevents Survivors from seeing auras.

Addon_Hatchet_GlowingConcoction.Name: Glowing Concoction
Addon_Hatchet_GlowingConcoction.Description:
An otherworldly concoction that faintly glows a foreboding light.
  • Reveals the auras of Survivors hit by Hatchets for 5 seconds.

Addon_Hatchet_PungentFiale.Name: Soldier's Puttee
Addon_Hatchet_PungentFiale.Description:
A wrap taken from a dead soldier, it provides protection and support to the ankle and lower leg.
  • The Huntress moves 4.6 m/s when she has no Hatchets.

Addon_Hatchet_MannaGrassBraid.Name: Manna Grass Braid
Addon_Hatchet_MannaGrassBraid.Description:
A circular decorative braid made from manna grass. This memory of a lost little one fills the Huntress with rage and focus.
  • Decreases time required to wind up a Hatchet throw by 8%.

Addon_Hatchet_FlowerBabushka.Name: Flower Babushka
Addon_Hatchet_FlowerBabushka.Description:
A clean and colorful kerchief adorned with a flower pattern. This memory of a lost little one fills the Huntress with rage and focus.
  • Decreases time required to wind up a Hatchet throw by 12%.

Addon_K24Power_1.Name: Damaged Syringe
Addon_K24Power_1.Description:
Medical equipment that fared poorly during the chaos that overwhelmed Raccoon City.
  • Increases time it takes Survivors to use a Vaccine by 2 seconds.
  • Increases length of Killer Instinct when Survivors use a Vaccine by 1.5 seconds.

Addon_K24Power_2.Name: Brian’s Intestine
Addon_K24Power_2.Description:
The small intestine of Brian Irons, chief of the RPD. It's an appetizing sight for zombies.
  • Increases zombie movement speed by 25%.

Addon_K24Power_3.Name: Visitor Wristband
Addon_K24Power_3.Description:
An electronic Umbrella wristband for visitors to the facility. It also doubles as a tracking device.
  • Increases zombie detection range by 2 meters and field of view by 10 degrees.

Addon_K24Power_4.Name: S.T.A.R.S. Field Combat Manual
Addon_K24Power_4.Description:
