A manual of compiled S.T.A.R.S. close-range combat knowledge. Edited by Chris Redfield.
  • Zombies’ auras turn yellow for 6 seconds after hitting a Survivor.

Addon_K24Power_5.Name: Marvin’s Blood
Addon_K24Power_5.Description:
The contaminated blood of a Raccoon City police officer.
  • Increases mutation rate when hitting Survivors with Tentacle Strike by 25%.


    • "All you need to know is that this place will eat you alive if you’re not careful." —Marvin Branagh

Addon_K24Power_6.Name: Adrenaline Injector
Addon_K24Power_6.Description:
A hormone that heightens senses and prepares the body to fight.
  • Increases length of Killer Instinct when Survivors use a Vaccine by 3 seconds.

Addon_K24Power_7.Name: Mikhail’s Eye
Addon_K24Power_7.Description:
While little was left of Mikhail, his left eyeball survived the blast that killed him. It remains a tasty treat for zombies.
  • Increases zombie movement speed by 35%.

Addon_K24Power_8.Name: Zombie Heart
Addon_K24Power_8.Description:
The heart of an eviscerated zombie. It’s considered hazardous waste as it’s certainly teeming with viruses.
  • Increases mutation rate when destroying zombies with Tentacle Strike by 50%.


    • "Words won’t work on this thing." —Leon S. Kennedy

Addon_K24Power_9.Name: Admin Wristband
Addon_K24Power_9.Description:
An electronic Umbrella wristband for administrators of the facility. While allowing access to secure areas, it also doubles as a tracking device.
  • Increases zombie detection range by 4 meters and field of view by 18 degrees.

Addon_K24Power_10.Name: Tyrant Gore
Addon_K24Power_10.Description:
A damaged sample from a T-002 Tyrant that died in combat. There are signs of severe burns.
  • Increases mutation rate when destroying zombies with Tentacle Strike by 50%.
  • Decreases zombie respawn time by 5 seconds.

Addon_K24Power_11.Name: Serotonin Injector
Addon_K24Power_11.Description:
A hormone that slightly relaxes the user for when stealth is required.
  • Grants Undetectable for 15 seconds when a zombie is destroyed.

    • Undetectable hides the Killer's aura, Terror Radius, and Red Stain.

Addon_K24Power_12.Name: T-Virus Sample
Addon_K24Power_12.Description:
A sample of the T-Virus developed by Umbrella Corporation, it causes extreme mutations and brain damage in its subjects.
  • Increases mutation rate when destroying zombies with Tentacle Strike by 100%.

Addon_K24Power_13.Name: Plant 43 Vines
Addon_K24Power_13.Description:
The tangled remnants of a plant infected with the T-Virus, it killed one of the researchers who developed it.
  • Increases time required for Survivors to open Supply Cases by 4 seconds.

Addon_K24Power_14.Name: Licker Tongue
Addon_K24Power_14.Description:
A sticky prehensile tongue that easily wraps around anything it touches.
  • Survivors are Hindered for an extra 0.2 seconds after being Contaminated.

    • Hindered reduces Survivor movement speed.

    "It’s like... a nightmare." —Claire Redfield

Addon_K24Power_15.Name: NE-α Parasite
Addon_K24Power_15.Description:
A parasite used in the development of Nemesis T-Types, it’s capable of hijacking its host’s brain.
  • Becoming Contaminated inflicts Oblivious for 60 seconds.

    • Oblivious prevents Survivors from hearing or being affected by the Killer's Terror Radius.

Addon_K24Power_16.Name: Jill’s Sandwich
Addon_K24Power_16.Description:
It’s tragically squished and dripping with blood from a recent battle. Despite that, it has a delicious aroma that can’t be missed.
  • Reveals a Survivor's aura for 12 seconds after they unlock a Supply Case.

Addon_K24Power_17.Name: Broken Recovery Coin
Addon_K24Power_17.Description:
A coin depicting a bird framed by a laurel wreath. It’s broken in half.
  • Removes 1 Supply Case from the trial.


    • "This is not how I imagined my first day." —Leon S. Kennedy

Addon_K24Power_18.Name: Depleted Ink Ribbon
Addon_K24Power_18.Description:
Who will save them now? There’s something about this ink ribbon being dry that energizes zombies.
  • Decreases zombie respawn time by 5 seconds.
  • Increases zombie movement speed by 50%.
  • Any zombies destroyed after all generators are repaired will respawn in an exit area.


    • "Look, just so you know... this is the last fucking time." —Jill Valentine

Addon_K24Power_19.Name: Shattered S.T.A.R.S. Badge
Addon_K24Power_19.Description:
A symbol of hope for Raccoon City, utterly destroyed.
  • Increases Zombie movement speed by 150% for 60 seconds after a generator is repaired.


    • "S.T.A.R.S..." —Nemesis

Addon_K24Power_20.Name: Iridescent Umbrella Badge
Addon_K24Power_20.Description:
A glass-like badge molded from The Fog itself. It represents a corporation that pushed far beyond ethical and humane science.
  • Survivors are inflicted with Exposed for 60 seconds when using a Vaccine.

    • Exposed Survivors will be downed by basic attacks even if uninjured.

    "Commitment, honesty, integrity. These are the core values that create the foundation of Umbrella Corp." —Dr. Matt Gorkis

Addon_DreamInducer_GardenRake.Name: Garden Rake
Addon_DreamInducer_GardenRake.Description:
A small claw rake, a must have tool for any accomplished gardener.
  • Replaces Dream Snares with Dream Pallets.
  • Grants 7 Dream Tokens.

Addon_DreamInducer_PrototypeClaws.Name: Prototype Claws
Addon_DreamInducer_PrototypeClaws.Description:
A homemade tool to facilitate bush trimming.
  • Replaces Dream Snares with Dream Pallets.
  • Grants 7 Dream Tokens.
  • Survivors who trigger a Dream Pallet have their auras revealed for 4 seconds.

Addon_DreamInducer_PaintThinner.Name: Paint Thinner
Addon_DreamInducer_PaintThinner.Description:
A tin of a highly volatile and inflammable material.
  • Replaces Dream Snares with Dream Pallets.
  • Grants 7 Dream Tokens.
  • Survivors who trigger a Dream Pallet have their auras revealed for 6 seconds.

Addon_DreamInducer_SheepBlock.Name: Sheep Block
Addon_DreamInducer_SheepBlock.Description:
A white and blue wooden block depicting two wooly lamb grazing and the letter "S".
  • Triggering Dream Snares or Dream Pallets inflicts Blindness for 30 seconds.

    • Blindness prevents Survivors from seeing auras.

Addon_DreamInducer_CatBlock.Name: Cat Block
Addon_DreamInducer_CatBlock.Description:
A white and purple wooden block depicting a sleeping cat and the letter "C".
  • Triggering Dream Snares or Dream Pallets inflicts Hemorrhage for 60 seconds.

    • Hemorrhage increases blood trails left by injured Survivors.

Addon_DreamInducer_UnicornBlock.Name: Unicorn Block
Addon_DreamInducer_UnicornBlock.Description:
A white and red wooden block depicting a prancing unicorn and the letter "U".
  • Triggering Dream Snares or Dream Pallets inflicts Blindness for 60 seconds.

    • Blindness prevents survivors from seeing auras.

Addon_DreamInducer_ZBlock.Name: "Z" Block
Addon_DreamInducer_ZBlock.Description:
A deeply scratched and burnt wooden block which only recognizable feature is the letter "Z".
  • Triggering Dream Snares or Dream Pallets inflicts Hemorrhage for 60 seconds.
  • If the Survivor is healthy, they bleed for the duration of the Hemorrhage effect.

    • Hemorrhage increases blood trails left by injured Survivors.

Addon_DreamInducer_WoolShirt.Name: Wool Shirt
Addon_DreamInducer_WoolShirt.Description:
A small boy's orange and yellow striped shirt. Identified with a sewn name tag to "Jesse".
While Survivors are in the Dream World:
  • Increases healing or repair skill check penalties by 4%.

Addon_DreamInducer_GreenDress.Name: Green Dress
Addon_DreamInducer_GreenDress.Description:
A little girl's green dress with a silky white ribbon.
While Survivors are in the Dream World:
  • Increases healing and repair skill check penalties by 4%.
  • Failing a healing or repair skill check reveals the Survivor's aura for 3 seconds.

Addon_DreamInducer_BlueDress.Name: Blue Dress
Addon_DreamInducer_BlueDress.Description:
A little girl's pale blue dress with white lace which front is ruined by large cuts.
While Survivors are in the Dream World:
  • Increases healing and repair skill check penalties by 4%.
  • Failing a healing or repair skill check reveals the Survivor's aura for 4 seconds.

Addon_DreamInducer_KidsDrawing.Name: Kid's Drawing
Addon_DreamInducer_KidsDrawing.Description:
An unattributed drawing clearly crafted by a young child.
  • Decreases the speed penalty inflicted by Dream Snares to 5%.
  • Grants 200 bonus Devious Bloodpoints when a Survivor triggers a Dream Snare.

Addon_DreamInducer_NancysSketch.Name: Nancy's Sketch
Addon_DreamInducer_NancysSketch.Description:
A crude and bold sketch made with fusain, signed Nancy H.
  • Decreases Dream Projection cooldown by 2% for each Survivor in the Dream World.

Addon_DreamInducer_NancysMasterpiece.Name: Nancy's Masterpiece
Addon_DreamInducer_NancysMasterpiece.Description:
A painting of a character, made by Nancy Holbrook at Badham and kept as a treasured memory.
  • Decreases Dream Projection cooldown by 3% for each Survivor in the Dream World.

Addon_DreamInducer_ClassPhoto.Name: Class Photo
Addon_DreamInducer_ClassPhoto.Description:
A large photograph taken at Badham preschool showing the cheerful class of 94-95.
  • Channeling Dream Projection can no longer be cancelled.
  • All generators will spew blood while The Nightmare channels Dream Projection.
  • The Nightmare's projection will not appear when using Dream Projection.

Addon_DreamInducer_PillBottle.Name: Pill Bottle
Addon_DreamInducer_PillBottle.Description:
An empty pill bottle which once contained a medicine called Zoneral.
  • Survivors will see The Nightmare intermittently at a reduced distance of 12 meters to 24 meters.
  • The Nightmare is invisible to Survivors beyond 24 meters.
  • The Nightmare is invisible to awake Survivors while carrying a Survivor.

Addon_DreamInducer_RedPaintBrush.Name: Red Paint Brush
Addon_DreamInducer_RedPaintBrush.Description:
A large paint brush, wet with crimson paint.
  • All Survivors start the trial in the Dream World.
  • Failed Skill Checks do not wake up Survivors in the Dream World.

Addon_DreamInducer_BlackBox.Name: Black Box
Addon_DreamInducer_BlackBox.Description:
A black cardboard box filled with photographs.
While Survivors are in the Dream World:
  • Recently-opened exit gates are blocked for 15 seconds.

Addon_DreamInducer_SwingChains.Name: Swing Chains
Addon_DreamInducer_SwingChains.Description:
Rusty but sturdy chains used to securely attach a swing seat.
While Survivors are in the Dream World:
  • The sounds of their footsteps are 50% louder.

Addon_DreamInducer_Rope.Name: Outdoor Rope
Addon_DreamInducer_Rope.Description:
Sturdy outdoor rope, handy to tie up anything.
While Survivors are in the Dream World:
  • The sounds of their generator repairs can be heard from 8 meters further away.

Addon_DreamInducer_JumpRope.Name: Jump Rope
Addon_DreamInducer_JumpRope.Description:
A long double dutch jump rope, stained with many years of use.
While Survivors are in the Dream World:
  • The sounds of their grunts of pain are 50% louder.

Addon_ReverseBearTrap_WorkshopGrease.Name: Workshop Grease
Addon_ReverseBearTrap_WorkshopGrease.Description:
A simple tube of grease, used to lubricate the mechanisms of the hidden blade.
  • Increases Ambush attack charge speed by 50%.
  • Decreases Ambush attack miss cooldown by 25%.

Addon_ReverseBearTrap_RazorWires.Name: Razor Wires
Addon_ReverseBearTrap_RazorWires.Description:
A modification to the Jigsaw Box: The addition of razor sharp wires makes it extra difficult and potentially painful to search.
  • Failing a Jigsaw Box skill check while uninjured will injure the Survivor.

Addon_ReverseBearTrap_JohnMedicalFile.Name: John's Medical File
Addon_ReverseBearTrap_JohnMedicalFile.Description:
The medical file of a cancerous man. Fills the reader with dread and recklessness.
  • Increases crouched move speed by 6%.

Addon_ReverseBearTrap_ShatteredSyringe.Name: Shattered Syringe
Addon_ReverseBearTrap_ShatteredSyringe.Description:
Symbol of a broken way of life. Reminiscing about her past-self hardens her determination.
  • Decreases Ambush attack miss cooldown by 25%.

Addon_ReverseBearTrap_VideoTape.Name: Video Tape
Addon_ReverseBearTrap_VideoTape.Description:
A recording of Jigsaw, explaining the game's rules to Amanda. Reminiscing about her past-self hardens her determination.
  • Survivors begin the trial with Reverse Bear Traps installed.

Addon_ReverseBearTrap_CombatStraps.Name: Combat Straps
Addon_ReverseBearTrap_CombatStraps.Description:
Leather straps that hold fabric in place for nimbler movement.
  • Increases crouching and uncrouching speed by 30%.

Addon_ReverseBearTrap_UtilityBlades.Name: Utility Blades
Addon_ReverseBearTrap_UtilityBlades.Description:
A modification to the Reverse Bear Trap: Sharp blades attached to the trap's interior lacerate the victim with every movement.
  • Reverse Bear Traps inflict Hemorrhage until removed.

    • Hemorrhage increases blood trails left by injured Survivors.

Addon_ReverseBearTrap_FaceMask.Name: Face Mask
Addon_ReverseBearTrap_FaceMask.Description:
A modification to the Reverse Bear Trap: The heavy cloth face mask, laced with a sedative, partially suffocates the target making it hard to concentrate.
  • Reverse Bear Traps inflict Blindness until removed.
  • Does not affect the Jigsaw Box aura.

    • Blindness prevents Survivors from seeing auras.

Addon_ReverseBearTrap_RustyAttachments.Name: Rusty Attachments
Addon_ReverseBearTrap_RustyAttachments.Description:
A modification to the Reverse Bear Trap: Mouth spikes, covered with crusty and volatile rust spots that make injuries particularly difficult to heal.
  • Reverse Bear Traps inflict Mangled until removed.

    • Mangled increases time required to heal by 25% and lasts until fully healed.

Addon_ReverseBearTrap_SlowReleasingToxin.Name: Slow-Release Toxin
Addon_ReverseBearTrap_SlowReleasingToxin.Description:
A modification to the Reverse Bear Trap: A poison that is not fatal but weakens the body and makes it nearly impossible to recover fully from any effort.
  • Reverse Bear Traps inflict Exhausted until removed.

    • Exhausted prevents Survivors from activating exhausting perks.

Addon_ReverseBearTrap_BagofGears.Name: Bag of Gears
Addon_ReverseBearTrap_BagofGears.Description:
A few mechanical parts that allow the creation of challenging Jigsaw Boxes and easier to install Reverse Bear Traps.
  • Increases Reverse Bear Trap setting speed by 50%.
  • Increases time required to search a Jigsaw Box by 17%.

Addon_ReverseBearTrap_CrateofGears.Name: Crate of Gears
Addon_ReverseBearTrap_CrateofGears.Description:
This collection of mechanical parts allows the creation of extra-challenging Jigsaw Boxes and Reverse Bear Traps that are easier to install.
  • Increases Reverse Bear Trap setting speed by 50%.
  • Increases time required to search a Jigsaw Box by 33%.

Addon_ReverseBearTrap_JigsawsSketch.Name: Jigsaw's Sketch
Addon_ReverseBearTrap_JigsawsSketch.Description:
A disturbing, yet brilliant, trap design sketched in details on a sheet of paper.
  • Increases available Reverse Bear Traps by 1.
  • When a Survivor with a Reverse Bear Trap is working on a generator, that generator's aura is revealed to you.

Addon_ReverseBearTrap_JigsawsAnnotatedPl.Name: Jigsaw's Annotated Plan
Addon_ReverseBearTrap_JigsawsAnnotatedPl.Description:
A disturbing, yet brilliant, trap design laid down on paper and annotated by Jigsaw.
  • Increases available Reverse Bear Traps by 1.
  • Increases Reverse Bear Trap death timer by 10 seconds.
  • Whenever a generator is completed, 10 seconds is removed from the death timer of all active Reverse Bear Traps.

Addon_ReverseBearTrap_AmandasLetter.Name: Amanda's Letter
Addon_ReverseBearTrap_AmandasLetter.Description:
A blackmailing letter for the attention of Amanda. Fills the reader with rage and focus.
  • While crouched, reveals auras of Survivors within 16 meters.
  • Decreases available Reverse Bear Traps by 2.

    • "Amanda, you were with Cecil the night Jill lost Gideon. You killed their child. You know it and I know it." -Amanda's Letter

Addon_ReverseBearTrap_TamperedTimer.Name: Tampered Timer
Addon_ReverseBearTrap_TamperedTimer.Description:
A timer that has been fiddled with. A spring in the mechanism forces the gears to turn faster.
  • Decreases the Reverse Bear Trap death timer by 20 seconds.

Addon_ReverseBearTrap_LastWill.Name: Last Will
Addon_ReverseBearTrap_LastWill.Description:
A latched wooden box with a satin lining, offered as part of a last will.
  • Increases Ambush attack movement speed by 6%.
  • Increases time to charge Ambush attack by 33%.

Addon_ReverseBearTrap_InterlockingRazor.Name: Interlocking Razor
Addon_ReverseBearTrap_InterlockingRazor.Description:
A modification to the Jigsaw Box: The addition of interlocking razor blades makes it impossible to move suddenly in the Jigsaw Box without suffering the consequences.
  • Failing a Jigsaw Box skill check while injured will inflict Deep Wound on Survivor.

    • Deep Wound will put a Survivor in the dying state unless it is mended before the timer runs out.

Addon_ReverseBearTrap_AmandasSecret.Name: Amanda's Secret
Addon_ReverseBearTrap_AmandasSecret.Description:
A black metal box containing a knife and various medical supplies, such as bandages and compresses. Deep cuts reduce stress and awaken the senses.
  • Disables The Pig's ability to see Jigsaw Boxes' auras.
  • Gain a notification when a Survivor removes a Reverse Bear Trap.
  • Auras of Survivors removing a Reverse Bear Trap are revealed to you for 6 seconds.

Addon_ReverseBearTrap_RuleSetN2.Name: Rule Set No.2
Addon_ReverseBearTrap_RuleSetN2.Description:
Not all games need to have the same rules.
  • Disables the Survivors' ability to see Jigsaw Boxes highlighted until their Trap is activated.

    • "Listen, there are rules" -Jigsaw

Addon_K25Power_01.Name: Bent Nail
Addon_K25Power_01.Description:
A simple nail that cut deep into Larry Cotton’s hand. Though the damage was superficial, it set into motion a horrifying set of events.
  • Gain 100% bonus Bloodpoints when binding a Survivor with a possessed chain.
  • When hitting a Survivor with a possessed chain, only 1 additional chain will spawn.

Addon_K25Power_02.Name: Lively Crickets
Addon_K25Power_02.Description:
Insects which scarcely avoided being eaten by a mysterious drifter.
  • Increases turn rate of possessed chains by 10%.

Addon_K25Power_03.Name: Burning Candle
Addon_K25Power_03.Description:
A candle lit by Frank Cotton during a fatal summoning ceremony.
  • Decreases the time for Chain Hunts to activate by 3 seconds.

Addon_K25Power_04.Name: Leather Strip
Addon_K25Power_04.Description:
Leather strips torn from a cenobite’s uniform, allowing for the mutilation of exposed flesh.
  • Decreases Summons of Pain’s cooldown time after possessing a chain by 3%.

Addon_K25Power_05.Name: Wriggling Maggots
Addon_K25Power_05.Description:
Larvae that poured from the mouth of a corpse hidden in the Cotton household.
  • Increases turn rate of possessed chains by 15%.

Addon_K25Power_06.Name: Spoiled Meal
Addon_K25Power_06.Description:
A pile of mold, feasted on by a cockroach. Perhaps a sign of Frank Cotton’s mysterious disappearance...
  • Increases the possessed chain’s maximum travel distance by 2 meters.

Addon_K25Power_07.Name: Skewered Rat
Addon_K25Power_07.Description:
A crude solution for the Cotton home’s rat problem.
  • Decreases Summons of Pain’s cooldown time after possessing a chain by 9%.

Addon_K25Power_08.Name: Flickering Television
Addon_K25Power_08.Description:
A television that acted strangely upon the arrival of the cenobites.
  • Increases the maximum casting range of the gateway by 4 meters.

Addon_K25Power_09.Name: Liquified Gore
Addon_K25Power_09.Description:
The result of summoning the cenobites. There’s no telling what part of the human body this belonged to.
  • Increases the time it takes Survivors to solve the Lament Configuration by 1 second.

Addon_K25Power_10.Name: Larry’s Blood
Addon_K25Power_10.Description:
The blood of Larry Cotton, which partially resurrected his brother Frank.
  • Increases the possessed chain's maximum travel distance by 4 meters.

Addon_K25Power_11.Name: Torture Pillar
Addon_K25Power_11.Description:
A dangling slab covered in the gore of past victims.
  • Decreases the time for Chain Hunts to activate by 6 seconds.

    • "This isn’t for your eyes." —Pinhead

Addon_K25Power_12.Name: Frank’s Heart
Addon_K25Power_12.Description:
The beating heart of Frank, given life from his brother’s blood.
  • Increases the maximum casting range of the gateway by 8 meters.

    • “Nobody escapes us.” —Pinhead

Addon_K25Power_13.Name: Larry’s Remains
Addon_K25Power_13.Description:
The skeletal remains of Larry Cotton, covered in a thick, sticky layer of blood.
  • Increases the time it takes Survivors to solve the Lament Configuration by 2 seconds.

    • "We want the man who did this." —Pinhead

Addon_K25Power_14.Name: Slice of Frank
Addon_K25Power_14.Description:
A slab of Frank’s face after his torture at the hand of the cenobites.
  • Survivors carrying the Lament Configuration are inflicted with Exhausted.

    • Exhausted prevents Survivors from activating exhausting perks.

    "The cenobites gave me an experience beyond limits. Pain and pleasure, indivisible." —Frank Cotton

Addon_K25Power_15.Name: Greasy Black Lens
Addon_K25Power_15.Description:
A lens from the sunglasses of an obese cenobite whose fleshy rolls droop down his face and neck.
  • Survivors hit by a possessed chain are revealed for 6 seconds.

Addon_K25Power_16.Name: Original Pain
Addon_K25Power_16.Description:
The first pin pushed into Pinhead’s skull. Such pleasure and pain.
  • Injured Survivors who break free from a possessed chain suffer from Deep Wound.

    • Deep Wound will put a Survivor in the dying state unless it is mended before the timer runs out.

    “No tears, please. It’s a waste of good suffering.” —Pinhead

Addon_K25Power_17.Name: Impaling Wire
Addon_K25Power_17.Description:
A wire that pierces the cheeks of a cenobite, while revealing the gaping wound on her neck.
  • When a Survivor uses the environment to break a chain, an additional chain will target them.

Addon_K25Power_18.Name: Chatterer’s Tooth
Addon_K25Power_18.Description:
A fragment from a cenobite whose mouth chatters endlessly. This tooth, having broken from his jaw, is finally silent.
  • Reveal the Lament Configuration.
  • Picking up the Lament Configuration deactivates Chain Hunts.
  • Gain the Undetectable status effect for 25 seconds after picking up the Lament Configuration.

    • Undetectable hides the Killer's aura, Terror Radius and Red Stain.

Addon_K25Power_19.Name: Engineer’s Fang
Addon_K25Power_19.Description:
A sharp tooth from the maw of a fleshy, scorpion-like creature, known to accompany cenobites on their grim undertakings.
  • Possessed chains injure healthy Survivors, but do not bind them or spawn additional chains.
  • Increases the time to close the gateway after hitting a healthy Survivor with a possessed chain by 50%.
  • When hitting an injured Survivor with a possessed chain, only 1 additional chain will spawn.

    • "We have such sights to show you." —Pinhead

Addon_K25Power_20.Name: Iridescent Lament Configuration
Addon_K25Power_20.Description:
A glass-like puzzle box molded from The Fog itself. This replica differs from the original, providing altogether new powers.
  • When a Chain Hunt is inactive, Survivors beyond 24 meters of the Lament Configuration cannot see its aura.

    • “You opened it. We came.” —Pinhead

Addon_GasBomb_01.Name: Robin Feather
Addon_GasBomb_01.Description:
A warm orange feather, soft to the touch.
  • Decreases bottle throw cooldown by 40%.

Addon_GasBomb_02.Name: Party Bottle
Addon_GasBomb_02.Description:
Be the life of the party!
  • Party Bottles emit confetti when they break, in addition to their usual gas effect.
  • Hitting a Survivor directly with a Party Bottle interrupts actions as usual, and awards 100 Devious Bloodpoints.

Addon_GasBomb_03.Name: Smelly Inner Soles
Addon_GasBomb_03.Description:
A moldy inner sole which gives much comfort to tired feet.
  • Increases movement speed while reloading bottles by 66%.

Addon_GasBomb_04.Name: Fingerless Parade Gloves
Addon_GasBomb_04.Description:
Part of the standard Clown apparel; the cut fingers allow for dexterous manipulations.
  • Increases bottle throw speed by 25%.
  • Decreases bottle throw angle by 15 degrees.

Addon_GasBomb_05.Name: Thick Cork Stopper
Addon_GasBomb_05.Description:
A sturdy cork, fitting The Afterpiece Tonic bottles perfectly.
  • Decreases reload time by 0.5 seconds.

Addon_GasBomb_06.Name: Solvent Jug
Addon_GasBomb_06.Description:
A volatile chemical compound that irritates the respiratory tract, but increases absorption of The Afterpiece Antidote.
  • Increases duration of Invigoration by 1 seconds.

Addon_GasBomb_07.Name: Kerosene Can
Addon_GasBomb_07.Description:
A thin and clear combustible liquid which numbs the mind when inhaled.
  • Intoxication inflicts Blindness for 30 seconds.

    • Blindness prevents Survivors from seeing auras.

Addon_GasBomb_08.Name: Sticky Soda Bottle
Addon_GasBomb_08.Description:
An empty bottle, sticky with dried sugar and blood.
  • Start with 1 extra bottle.
  • Increases maximum carried bottles amount by 1.

Addon_GasBomb_09.Name: Starling Feather
Addon_GasBomb_09.Description:
A black feather with an emerald sheen, very soft to the touch.
  • Decreases bottle throw cooldown by 50%.

Addon_GasBomb_10.Name: VHS Porn
Addon_GasBomb_10.Description:
An all time classic. You won't see things quite the same again.
  • Makes Afterpiece Tonic clouds yellow.
  • Makes Afterpiece Antidote clouds purple.

Addon_GasBomb_11.Name: Spirit of Hartshorn
Addon_GasBomb_11.Description:
A pungent chemical compound consisting of ammonia. One whiff is enough to jolt even the most sluggish of minds.
  • Increases the size and spread of Afterpiece Antidote gas clouds by 20%.

Addon_GasBomb_12.Name: Sulfuric Acid Vial
Addon_GasBomb_12.Description:
An odorless syrupy liquid which is highly corrosive.
  • Intoxication inflicts Mangled.

    • Mangled increases time required to heal by 25% and lasts until fully healed.

Addon_GasBomb_13.Name: Flask of Bleach
Addon_GasBomb_13.Description:
A potent chemical which causes irritation, burn and lungs damage.
  • Increases the Hindered penalty from Intoxication by an additional 4%.

    • Hindered reduces Survivor movement speed.

Addon_GasBomb_14.Name: Bottle of Chloroform
Addon_GasBomb_14.Description:
A sweet-smelling organic compound with strong anesthetic capabilities.
  • Increases the size and spread of Afterpiece Tonic gas clouds by 20%.

Addon_GasBomb_15.Name: Garish Makeup Kit
Addon_GasBomb_15.Description:
Some for the face and some for the Antidote. The unknown compound intensifies the Antidote's effects.
  • Increases the duration of Invigoration by 2 seconds.

Addon_GasBomb_16.Name: Cheap Gin Bottle
Addon_GasBomb_16.Description:
Along with a hell of a headache, the only remnant of a good time, done cheap.
  • Start with 2 extra bottles.
  • Increases maximum carried bottles amount by 2.

Addon_GasBomb_17.Name: Ether 15 vol%
Addon_GasBomb_17.Description:
A highly volatile organic compound, toxic at this concentration.
  • Increases the duration of Intoxication by 1 second.

Addon_GasBomb_18.Name: Cigar Box
Addon_GasBomb_18.Description:
A grim and incomplete collection of fingers. Fills The Clown with longing and focuses his chemical crafting abilities.
  • While The Clown or a Survivor is Invigorated, they see all other Survivor and Killer auras within 16 meters.

Addon_GasBomb_19.Name: Tattoo's Middle Finger
Addon_GasBomb_19.Description:
The prized middle finger of a large tattooed man. Has a faint taste of machinery oil.
  • Auras of Intoxicated or Invigorated Survivors are revealed to you for 6 seconds.

Addon_GasBomb_20.Name: Redhead's Pinky Finger
Addon_GasBomb_20.Description:
The prized pinky of a redhead. Faintly fragrant. Tastes of potpourri and varnish.
  • Direct hits by a bottle of Afterpiece Tonic inflict Exposed until Intoxication ends.
  • Start with 2 fewer bottles.
  • Decreases maximum carried bottles amount by 2.

    • Exposed Survivors will be downed by basic attacks even if uninjured.

Addon_Guam_09_.Name: Addon_Guam_09_NAME
Addon_Guam_09_.Description: Moderately decreases cooldown time between Gas Bomb throws.

Addon_PhaseWalker_Zori.Name: Zōri
Addon_PhaseWalker_Zori.Description:
A comfortable pair of flat sandals that can easily be slipped on and off.
  • Increases Yamaoka's Haunting movement speed by 5%.

Addon_PhaseWalker_ShiawaseAmulet.Name: Shiawase Amulet
Addon_PhaseWalker_ShiawaseAmulet.Description:
A talisman that makes one happy and enthusiastic.
  • Increases Yamaoka's Haunting duration by 10%.

Addon_PhaseWalker_GiftedBambooComb.Name: Gifted Bamboo Comb
Addon_PhaseWalker_GiftedBambooComb.Description:
A narrow tooth bamboo comb to gently untangle disheveled hair.
  • Increases Yamaoka's Haunting charge speed by 15%.

Addon_PhaseWalker_OrigamiCrane.Name: Origami Crane
Addon_PhaseWalker_OrigamiCrane.Description:
One of the one thousand orizuru for your wish to come true.
  • Increases Yamaoka's Haunting recharge rate by 10%.

Addon_PhaseWalker_KaiunTalisman.Name: Kaiun Talisman
Addon_PhaseWalker_KaiunTalisman.Description:
A talisman to get luck on your side.
  • Increases Yamaoka's Haunting duration by 20%.

Addon_PhaseWalker_WhiteHairRibbon.Name: White Hair Ribbon
Addon_PhaseWalker_WhiteHairRibbon.Description:
A silken bow to tame wild hair.
  • Increases Yamaoka's Haunting charge speed by 20%.

Addon_PhaseWalker_MuddySportsDayCap.Name: Muddy Sports Day Cap
Addon_PhaseWalker_MuddySportsDayCap.Description:
A muddy sport cap with a High School logo. Identified with a sewn name tag to "Rin".
  • Increases Yamaoka's Haunting movement speed by 10%.

Addon_PhaseWalker_JuniperBonsai.Name: Juniper Bonsai
Addon_PhaseWalker_JuniperBonsai.Description:
Dark blue-green foliage bonsai tree. Once the symbol of Yamaoka family tradition.
  • Increases Passive Phasing frequency by 20%.
  • Increases Passive Phasing duration by 50%.

Addon_PhaseWalker_RinsBrokenWatch.Name: Rin's Broken Watch
Addon_PhaseWalker_RinsBrokenWatch.Description:
A wristwatch with a shattered glass. The name "Rin" is scribbled on the wristband.
  • Increases Yamaoka's Haunting recharge rate by 15%.

Addon_PhaseWalker_DirtyUwabaki.Name: Uchiwa
Addon_PhaseWalker_DirtyUwabaki.Description:
Handheld fan with a koi motif to create a nice breeze on a hot summer day.
  • Instantly recharges Yamaoka's Haunting when stunned by a pallet.

Addon_PhaseWalker_KatsumoriTalisman.Name: Senko Hanabi
Addon_PhaseWalker_KatsumoriTalisman.Description:
Thin sparklers that light up summer nights and display the beauty of ephemeral moments in life.
  • When Yamaoka's Haunting ends, The Spirit's husk explodes and any vault locations within 4 meters are blocked for 5 seconds.

Addon_PhaseWalker_BloodyHairBrooch.Name: Mother's Glasses
Addon_PhaseWalker_BloodyHairBrooch.Description:
Pair of glasses belonging to a loving mother afflicted with a chronic disease.
  • Survivors trigger Killer Instinct when they come within 2 meters of the husk.

Addon_PhaseWalker_RustyFlute.Name: Rusty Flute
Addon_PhaseWalker_RustyFlute.Description:
A rusty transverse flute with a haunting sound.
  • Increases Yamaoka's Haunting recharge rate by 25%.

Addon_PhaseWalker_KatanaTsuba.Name: Katana Tsuba
Addon_PhaseWalker_KatanaTsuba.Description:
The handguard of an ancestral blade. Crafted for the Yamaoka family.
  • Increases Yamaoka's Haunting reappearance duration by 20%.
  • Increases Yamaoka's Haunting reappearance movement speed by 5%.

Addon_PhaseWalker_YakuyokeAmulet.Name: Yakuyoke Amulet
Addon_PhaseWalker_YakuyokeAmulet.Description:
A powerful talisman to protect your endeavors from being hindered by suspicious circumstances.
  • Increases Yamaoka's Haunting duration by 70%.
  • Decreases Yamaoka's Haunting movement speed by 15%.

Addon_PhaseWalker_DriedCherryBlossom.Name: Dried Cherry Blossom
Addon_PhaseWalker_DriedCherryBlossom.Description:
A crumbling, dried cherry flower. Once the symbol of mortality.
  • Survivors trigger Killer Instinct when they come within 4 meters of The Spirit while she is phasing.
  • Scratch marks are no longer visible while using Yamaoka’s Haunting.

Addon_PhaseWalker_PrayerBeadsBracelet.Name: Furin
Addon_PhaseWalker_PrayerBeadsBracelet.Description:
Warm summer breeze chimes the little bell hanging from the balcony ceiling.
  • The phasing sound is heard by all Survivors.

Addon_PhaseWalker_WakizashiSaya.Name: Wakizashi Saya
Addon_PhaseWalker_WakizashiSaya.Description:
The scabbard of an ancestral blade. Once crafted for the Yamaoka family.
  • During Yamaoka's Haunting, use the Active Ability Button to return to the husk and end the haunting.

Addon_PhaseWalker_MotherDaughterRing.Name: Mother-Daughter Ring
Addon_PhaseWalker_MotherDaughterRing.Description:
A silver ring engraved with “for my precious daughter.”
  • Increases Yamaoka's Haunting movement speed by 40%.
  • Scratch marks are no longer visible while using Yamaoka’s Haunting.

Addon_PhaseWalker_FathersGlasses.Name: Kintsugi Teacup
Addon_PhaseWalker_FathersGlasses.Description:
Cup mended and lacquered with powdered gold. Both the breakage and repair are part the cup.
  • Instantly recharges Yamaoka's Haunting after breaking a pallet or wall.

Addon_K26Power_01.Name: Oil Paints
Addon_K26Power_01.Description:
There's little left but a few globs of black and gray, yet Carmina could paint an expansive landscape with them.
  • Increases the Dire Crow's Killer Instinct detection range by 1.5 meters.

    • Killer Instinct intermittently reveals the location of Survivors.

Addon_K26Power_02.Name: Vibrant Obituary
Addon_K26Power_02.Description:
Scrap newspaper, speckled with bright, eye-catching paint. It seems tragedy is a daily thing.
  • Increases the length of time a Dire Crow's Killer Instinct reveals Survivors by 1.5 seconds.

    • Killer Instinct intermittently reveals the location of Survivors.

Addon_K26Power_03.Name: Thick Tar
Addon_K26Power_03.Description:
Sticky, viscous sludge that Carmina used for an experimental piece. Once it sticks to skin, it's nearly impossible to get off.
  • Increases the time for Survivors to repel a Dire Crow swarm by 0.5 seconds.

Addon_K26Power_04.Name: Choclo Corn
Addon_K26Power_04.Description:
A type of corn common in South America. A few kernels are reason enough for a crow to stop for a snack.
  • Increases the time Dire Crows stay idle for before disintegrating by 2 seconds.

Addon_K26Power_05.Name: Automatic Drawing
Addon_K26Power_05.Description:
An experimental drawing Carmina made without conscious planning. Do not think—act.
  • Decreases Birds of Torment cooldown time by 1.5 seconds after a Dire Crow disintegrates from inactivity.

Addon_K26Power_06.Name: Festering Carrion
Addon_K26Power_06.Description:
A stomach-churning pile of meat and guts, yet it attracts hungry crows craving a bite.
  • Decreases Birds of Torment cooldown time by 0.5 seconds after a Dire Crow takes flight.

Addon_K26Power_07.Name: Velvet Fabric
Addon_K26Power_07.Description:
A striking red fabric Carmina used on an art project. Its brightness contrasted against black feathers.
  • When a Survivor attempts to repel a Dire Crow swarm, the swarm's aura remains visible for an additional 1.5 seconds.

Addon_K26Power_08.Name: Still Life Crow
Addon_K26Power_08.Description:
An ink drawing of a dead crow. Carmina's sadness over its death can be felt with each dark line.
  • Increases the time Dire Crows stay idle before disintegrating by 4 seconds.

Addon_K26Power_09.Name: Untitled Agony
Addon_K26Power_09.Description:
A canvas that was targeted with swipes and thrashes of black paint following Matias' death. It radiates with heavy, crippling sorrow.
  • When Dire Crows swarm a Survivor, it afflicts them with the Hindered status effect for 1.5 seconds.

    • Hindered reduces Survivor movement speed.

Addon_K26Power_10.Name: Charcoal Stick
Addon_K26Power_10.Description:
A stick of charcoal that conceals anything it rubs over.
  • The Dire Crow's aura is no longer visible when in flight.
  • The Dire Crow's aura is visible for 0.5 seconds when summoned.

Addon_K26Power_11.Name: Darkest Ink
Addon_K26Power_11.Description:
An unnatural ink, so wretched and dark that it seems to pull in light around it.
  • When Dire Crows swarm a Survivor, it afflicts them with the Blindness status effect. The effect persists for 15 seconds after Dire Crows are repelled from a Survivor.

    • Blindness prevents survivors from seeing auras.

Addon_K26Power_12.Name: O Grief, O Lover
Addon_K26Power_12.Description:
An abstract ink drawing that Carmina drew before walking to the Death Leap.
  • When Dire Crows swarm a Survivor, it afflicts them with the Exhausted status effect.

    • Exhausted prevents Survivors from activating certain perks.

Addon_K26Power_13.Name: Thorny Nest
Addon_K26Power_13.Description:
A nest that remained empty near Carmina's home. There are sharp thorns embedded in it.
  • Survivors damaged by a Dire Crow are afflicted with the Hemorrhage and Mangled status effects.

    • Hemorrhage increases blood trails left by injured Survivors.
    Mangled increases time required to heal by 25% and lasts until fully healed.

Addon_K26Power_14.Name: Silver Bell
Addon_K26Power_14.Description:
A shiny trinket that a crow took a liking to. The clinking of the bell was a distraction to all but Carmina.
  • When Dire Crows swarm a Survivor it afflicts them with the Oblivious status effect.

    • Oblivious prevents Survivors from hearing and being affected by the Killer's Terror Radius.

Addon_K26Power_15.Name: Matias' Baby Shoes
Addon_K26Power_15.Description:
A grieving reminder to Carmina that Matias would be with her, always watching.
  • Survivors within 5 meters of an idle Dire Crow have their auras revealed for 3 seconds.

    • "See you soon, Matias." —Carmina Mora

Addon_K26Power_16.Name: Severed Tongue
Addon_K26Power_16.Description:
Carmina's tongue, cut from her mouth shortly before her death. The sight instills rage not just in her, but in her crows.
  • Decreases the length of time The Artist's movement slows when Dire Crows take flight by 0.5 seconds.

    • "How are you going to tell poems now?"—Hooded Man

Addon_K26Power_17.Name: Garden of Rot
Addon_K26Power_17.Description:
A nude self-portrait in which Carmina depicts a rotting darkness growing outwards from within.
  • When a Survivor affected by Dire Crows completes the repel action, they are afflicted by the Exposed status effect for 4 seconds.

    • Exposed Survivors are downed by basic attacks, even if uninjured.

    "I see no salvation in the rot."—Carmina Mora

Addon_K26Power_18.Name: Ink Egg
Addon_K26Power_18.Description:
An unusual egg that seems to be nothing but a ball of semi-solid ink.
  • Increases the maximum capacity of Dire Crows by 1.
  • Decreases the time Dire Crows stay idle before disintegrating by 4 seconds.

    • "Perhaps, covered in darkness as I was, they saw me as one of their own." —Carmina Mora

Addon_K26Power_19.Name: Severed Hands
Addon_K26Power_19.Description:
Carmina's severed hands, cut from her arms shortly before her death. The sight brings sheer fury to her and her protectors.
  • Any Survivors near a Survivor being swarmed by Dire Crows will also be swarmed.

    • "How are you going to paint now?" —Hooded Man

Addon_K26Power_20.Name: Iridescent Feather
Addon_K26Power_20.Description:
A glass-like feather molded from The Fog itself. Simple as it may be, it's a symbol of those who watch over Carmina.
  • The Artist gains the Undetectable status effect when Birds of Torment is in cooldown and she holds no Dire Crows.
  • Decreases the maximum capacity of Dire Crows by 1.

    • Undetectable hides the Killer's aura, Terror Radius, and Red Stain.

    "They saved me when I couldn't save myself." —Carmina Mora

ADDON_Frenzy_FriendshipBracelet.Name: Friendship Bracelet
ADDON_Frenzy_FriendshipBracelet.Description:
A wide gray and red braided rope bracelet. The inscription "F J S J" can be seen, crudely written in bold black ink.
  • Increases Killer Instinct detection range by 4 meters.

ADDON_Frenzy_MischiefList.Name: Mischief List
ADDON_Frenzy_MischiefList.Description:
A list of mischievous missions to accomplish; memento of brighter days.
  • Increases the duration of Feral Frenzy by 1 second.

ADDON_Frenzy_SmileyFacePin.Name: Smiley Face Pin
ADDON_Frenzy_SmileyFacePin.Description:
A friendly-looking bright yellow button used as a sarcastic statement.
  • Hitting a Survivor highlighted by Killer Instinct while in Feral Frenzy inflicts Blindness for 60 seconds.

    • Blindness prevents Survivors from seeing auras.

ADDON_Frenzy_ScratchedRuler.Name: Scratched Ruler
ADDON_Frenzy_ScratchedRuler.Description:
A wooden ruler deeply scratched with hash marks.
  • Decreases Feral Frenzy recharge time by 2 seconds.

ADDON_Frenzy_MuralSketch.Name: Mural Sketch
ADDON_Frenzy_MuralSketch.Description:
A rough sketch of The Legion mural torn from a notebook.
  • Increases Feral Frenzy duration by 1.5 seconds.

ADDON_Frenzy_NeverSleepPills.Name: Never-Sleep Pills
ADDON_Frenzy_NeverSleepPills.Description:
Highly caffeinated tablets to make you extra sharp for exams or other draining activities.
  • Increases Killer Instinct detection range by 8 meters.

ADDON_Frenzy_EtchedRuler.Name: Etched Ruler
ADDON_Frenzy_EtchedRuler.Description:
A wooden ruler deeply etched with the names of enemies.
  • Decreases Feral Frenzy recharge time by 3.5 seconds.

ADDON_Frenzy_JuliesMixTape.Name: Julie's Mix Tape
ADDON_Frenzy_JuliesMixTape.Description:
A dark and depressing mix tape made mainly from power ballads with gloomy melodies.
  • Decreases Feral Frenzy cooldown by 0.2 seconds.

ADDON_Frenzy_DefacedSmileyPin.Name: Defaced Smiley Pin
ADDON_Frenzy_DefacedSmileyPin.Description:
A once friendly-looking bright yellow button of a defaced smiley. A signature icon of The Legion.
  • Hitting a Survivor highlighted by Killer Instinct while in Feral Frenzy inflicts Mangled.

    • Mangled increases time required to heal by 25% and lasts until fully healed.

ADDON_Frenzy_SusiesMixTape.Name: Susie's Mix Tape
ADDON_Frenzy_SusiesMixTape.Description:
A fast and thrilling mix tape of energizing songs with break-neck beats.
  • Increases Killer Instinct detection range by 16 meters.

ADDON_Frenzy_StolenSketchBook.Name: Stolen Sketch Book
ADDON_Frenzy_StolenSketchBook.Description:
A sketch book with imaginative and evocative, if not slightly bizarre, sketches.
  • Increases Feral Frenzy duration by 2.5 seconds.

ADDON_Frenzy_TheLegionPin.Name: The Legion Pin
ADDON_Frenzy_TheLegionPin.Description:
A handmade button with the face of The Legion. To use exclusively on intimidation dares.
  • Hitting a Survivor highlighted by Killer Instinct while in Feral Frenzy inflicts Broken for 60 seconds.

    • Broken prevents Survivors from being healed.

ADDON_Frenzy_NastyBlade.Name: Nasty Blade
ADDON_Frenzy_NastyBlade.Description:
This blade is stained with unsanitary spots of grime that make injuries particularly difficult to mend.
  • Increases time required for Survivors to mend by 1.5 seconds.

ADDON_Frenzy_JoeysMixTape.Name: Joey's Mix Tape
ADDON_Frenzy_JoeysMixTape.Description:
A mix of bangin' tracks and slammin' beats for chillaxin' when life's a bitch.
  • Decreases Feral Frenzy cooldown by 0.4 seconds.

ADDON_Frenzy_FilthyBlade.Name: Filthy Blade
ADDON_Frenzy_FilthyBlade.Description:
This blade is stained with foul spots of blood and grime that make injuries particularly difficult to mend.
  • Increases time required for Survivors to mend by 2.5 seconds.

ADDON_Frenzy_FranksMixTape.Name: Frank's Mix Tape
ADDON_Frenzy_FranksMixTape.Description:
Never go on a kill mission without your tunes. A track list of massive distortion and loud percussion that stabs at your eardrums.
  • Hitting a Survivor with Deep Wound while in Feral Frenzy decreases the Deep Wound timer by 5 seconds.

    • Deep Wound will put a Survivor in the dying state unless it is mended before the timer runs out.

ADDON_Frenzy_ColdDirt.Name: Cold Dirt
ADDON_Frenzy_ColdDirt.Description:
A handful of dirt collected from the janitor's final resting place. It is unnaturally cold.
  • Decreases Feral Frenzy cooldown by 0.6 seconds.

ADDON_Frenzy_StabWoundsStudy.Name: Stab Wounds Study
ADDON_Frenzy_StabWoundsStudy.Description:
A printed medical article stolen from Ormond's public library vulgarizing a study on lesions and stab wounds.
  • Decreases the Deep Wound timer of all Survivors by 5 seconds.

    • Deep Wound will put a Survivor in the dying state unless it is mended before the timer runs out.

ADDON_Frenzy_FumingMixTape.Name: Fuming Mix Tape
ADDON_Frenzy_FumingMixTape.Description:
Dark beats, violent shreds and unfathomable vocals from another world fill the mind with a vibrating sixth sense.
  • While using Feral Frenzy, the repair progress of generators can be determined by the intensity of their auras.

ADDON_Frenzy_IridescentButton.Name: Iridescent Button
ADDON_Frenzy_IridescentButton.Description:
A glass-like button molded from The Fog that captures The Legion’s likeness. The surface is warm and reverberating with The Entity's power.

During Feral Frenzy:
  • Your Terror Radius affects the entire map.
  • Any pallets you vault are immediately broken.

    • This effect lasts until the power gauge is depleted.

    “The youth consumed by the iridescent glass magnifies and widens the reach of The Entity.”

Addon_TheOnryo_01.Name: Videotape Copy
Addon_TheOnryo_01.Description:
A copy of the deadly videotape imprinted upon by Sadako. It dampens the desire for vengeance.
  • Projection does not inflict Condemned to nearby Survivors.
  • Gain 100% bonus Bloodpoints for Deluge of Fear score events.

Addon_TheOnryo_02.Name: Old Newspaper
Addon_TheOnryo_02.Description:
It tells of a local woman who predicted a volcanic eruption, evidence used to initially find Sadako.
  • Increases the Manifestation invisibility duration by 33%.

Addon_TheOnryo_03.Name: Cabin Sign
Addon_TheOnryo_03.Description:
The cabin where both Tomoko and Reiko watched the tape. Carries the memory of those first curses.
  • Decreases the time it takes for a TV to turn on after Projection by 12 seconds.

Addon_TheOnryo_04.Name: Mother's Mirror
Addon_TheOnryo_04.Description:
A mirror from Sadako's mother's house. A reminder of what Sadako has lost.
  • Increases the Manifestation intermittent visibility duration by 2 seconds.

Addon_TheOnryo_05.Name: Reiko's Watch
Addon_TheOnryo_05.Description:
The watch that Reiko left her son Yoichi. A distracting and constant reminder of one’s impending doom.
  • Increases the invisibility duration while Demanifested by 50%.

Addon_TheOnryo_06.Name: Sea-Soaked Cloth
Addon_TheOnryo_06.Description:
The hood worn by the mysterious figure in the tape. Makes those near it unable to trust what they see.
  • While Survivors are within 8 meters of a powered TV, they are afflicted with the Blindness status effect. This effect lingers for 7 seconds after the TV is turned off.

    • Blindness prevents Survivors from seeing auras.

Addon_TheOnryo_07.Name: Clump of Hair
Addon_TheOnryo_07.Description:
Once beautiful and long, Sadako now hides behind her ragged, matted locks.
  • Decreases the range at which The Onryō is visible while Demanifested by 6 meters.

Addon_TheOnryo_08.Name: Well Stone
Addon_TheOnryo_08.Description:
A piece of the well where Sadako was trapped, an image burned into the mind of all those who have watched the tape.
  • Decreases the time it takes for a TV to turn on after being turned off by a Survivor by 6 seconds.

Addon_TheOnryo_09.Name: Yoichi's Fishing Net
Addon_TheOnryo_09.Description:
The net Yoichi used while fishing with his grandfather. A reminder that death comes to us all.
  • Decreases the time it takes for Survivors to gain Condemned by 20% when holding a Tape.

Addon_TheOnryo_10.Name: Rickety Pinwheel
Addon_TheOnryo_10.Description:
A pinwheel found in the caves of Izu Oshima. It spins even when there is no wind, disorienting those who see or hear it.
  • While Survivors are within 8 meters of a powered TV, they are afflicted with the Oblivious status effect. This effect lingers for 7 seconds after the TV is turned off.

    • Oblivious prevents Survivors from hearing or being affected by the Killer's Terror Radius.

Addon_TheOnryo_11.Name: Well Water
Addon_TheOnryo_11.Description:
Water from the well where Sadako was left to die. Murky and black, it obscures everything around it.
  • Increases the duration of the Undetectable status effect by 2 seconds when Manifesting by any means.

    • Undetectable hides the Killer's aura, Terror Radius, and Red Stain.

Addon_TheOnryo_12.Name: Ring Drawing
Addon_TheOnryo_12.Description:
A drawing of the view from inside the well, as drawn by a young Yoichi. Helping those cursed by the tape can only bring misfortune.
  • Condemned Survivors spread Condemned to other Survivors who complete a healing action on them.

Addon_TheOnryo_13.Name: Bloody Fingernails
Addon_TheOnryo_13.Description:
Sadako's bloody fingernails, lost as she tried to claw her way out of the well. Evidence of her single-minded need to kill.
  • Increases the duration of Projection’s bonus movement speed by 50%.

Addon_TheOnryo_14.Name: Mother's Comb
Addon_TheOnryo_14.Description:
The comb Sadako's mother used in the tape. Sadako's psychic abilities are enhanced when she focuses on it.
  • Reveals the yellow aura of any TV that is turned off by any means.

Addon_TheOnryo_15.Name: VCR
Addon_TheOnryo_15.Description:
The original VCR that played Sadako's tape. It is still warm to the touch.
  • All TVs play the Projection effects when The Onryō Projects to a TV.

Addon_TheOnryo_16.Name: Distorted Photo
Addon_TheOnryo_16.Description:
Those who have watched the tape find all photos of them distorted, a reminder of their impending doom.
  • Survivors that witness Manifestation from within 16 meters scream, revealing their location for 4 seconds.

    • "Why is it only you were saved?" —Sadako Yamamura

Addon_TheOnryo_17.Name: Telephone
Addon_TheOnryo_17.Description:
After watching the video, victims receive a phone call. They are frozen in fear as they realize they have seven days to live.
  • Manifestation afflicts Survivors within 7 meters with the Hindered status effect for 3 seconds.

    • Hindered reduces Survivor movement speed.
    "I saw a weird video the other day... after it ended, someone called us. Some kind of prank call." —Tomoko Oishi

Addon_TheOnryo_18.Name: Tape Editing Deck
Addon_TheOnryo_18.Description:
The editing deck used by Reiko and Ryuji to analyze and copy the tape. Copying and sharing the tape is the only way to survive the curse.
  • Each Survivor starts the trial with a Tape in their possession, and their target TV is the furthest from their location.

    • "Frolic in brine, goblins be thine." —Message hidden in Sadako's tape

Addon_TheOnryo_19.Name: Remote Control
Addon_TheOnryo_19.Description:
A remote for the VCR at the cabin. It allows Sadako to focus on those enemies at a distance.
  • After using Projection, reveal the auras of Survivors carrying a Tape within 16 meters of any TV for 7 seconds.

    • "She killed a man just by willing him dead. That's power of a different order from her mother." —Ryuji Takayama

Addon_TheOnryo_20.Name: Iridescent Videotape
Addon_TheOnryo_20.Description:
The original tape containing Sadako’s curse.
  • Hitting a Survivor within 8 seconds after Manifesting turns on the last 4 TVs turned off by Projection.

    • "That video... It's not of this world. It's Sadako's rage." —Ryuji Takayama

Addon_Plague_HealingSalve.Name: Healing Salve
Addon_Plague_HealingSalve.Description:
A bitterly pungent paste of crushed roots, which were marinated in fish brine for three days and in wine for two. Applied on skin rashes.
  • Decreases cooldown of Vile Purge and Corrupt Purge by 0.25 seconds.

Addon_Plague_PrayerTabletFragment.Name: Prayer Tablet Fragment
Addon_Plague_PrayerTabletFragment.Description:
A fragmented stone tablet with a corrupted incantation originally used to purge illnesses and feelings of general malaise.
  • Vile Purge no longer affects Survivors.
  • Increases object infection duration by 40 seconds.
  • Increases infection from infected objects by 100%.
  • Increases Devious Bloodpoints by 100%.

Addon_Plague_OlibanumIncense.Name: Olibanum Incense
Addon_Plague_OlibanumIncense.Description:
Precious resin extracted from Boswellia trees, used during ceremonies for their sweet citrusy fragrance.
  • Survivors who cleanse at fountains have their auras revealed for 4 seconds.

Addon_Plague_LimestoneSeal.Name: Limestone Seal
Addon_Plague_LimestoneSeal.Description:
A cylindrical seal made from porous stone that displays a ritualistic scene with winged deities.
  • Increases object infection duration by 20 seconds.

Addon_Plague_PrayerApple.Name: Blessed Apple
Addon_Plague_PrayerApple.Description:
A perfectly ripe fruit to break fast during the purification ceremony. Delicious.
  • Start the Trial with 1 additional Pool of Devotion already corrupted.

Addon_Plague_ProphylacticAmulet.Name: Prophylactic Amulet
Addon_Plague_ProphylacticAmulet.Description:
A soapstone amulet crudely engraved with a winged deity that wards off sickness. Fills the wearer with devotion.
  • Decreases the number of Pools of Devotion in the Trial by 2.

Addon_Plague_PotentTincture.Name: Potent Tincture
Addon_Plague_PotentTincture.Description:
A frothing, murky liquid that permeates the air with an acute aroma of herbs and alcohol. Applied directly on blisters.
  • Decreases cooldown of Vile Purge and Corrupt Purge by 0.4 seconds.

Addon_Plague_EmeticPotion.Name: Emetic potion
Addon_Plague_EmeticPotion.Description:
A mustard-water based syrup that induces vomiting when consumed. Used to purge evil from the body.
  • Increases the effectiveness of Vile Purge by 30%.

Addon_Plague_HematiteSeal.Name: Hematite Seal
Addon_Plague_HematiteSeal.Description:
A cylindrical seal forged from a metallic hardstone, engraved with bird-headed beings that stood next to strange machines. Used as a container for sanctified ashes.
  • Increases object infection duration by 30 seconds.

Addon_Plague_IncensedOintment.Name: Incensed Ointment
Addon_Plague_IncensedOintment.Description:
A dark waxy paste, laced with cedar sap that diffuse a sweet and earthy aroma. Applied directly on infected skin.
  • Ingesting the corruption at a Pool of Devotion causes all Survivors within The Plague's Terror Radius to scream and reveal their locations.

Addon_Plague_InfectedEmetic.Name: Infected Emetic
Addon_Plague_InfectedEmetic.Description:
A disgusting syrup of unknown origin. The thick yellow liquid is consumed to induce vomiting. Used to purge evil from the body.
  • Increases the effectiveness of Vile Purge by 40%.

Addon_Plague_AshenApple.Name: Ashen Apple
Addon_Plague_AshenApple.Description:
A peeled apple rolled into sanctified ashes. Eating such a fruit warded off the malignantly envious spirits of the deceased.
  • Start the Trial with 1 additional Pool of Devotion already corrupted.
  • Increases the number of Pools of Devotion in the trial by 1.

Addon_Plague_RubbingOil.Name: Rubbing Oil
Addon_Plague_RubbingOil.Description:
A beaker of rubbing oil with expectorant quality. Exudes the evergreen scent of laurel and rosemary.
  • Increases the charge rate of Vile Purge and Corrupt Purge by 50%.

Addon_Plague_ExorcismAmulet.Name: Exorcism Amulet
Addon_Plague_ExorcismAmulet.Description:
An obsidian amulet to ward off sickness during exorcism rituals. Inscribed with a prayer to the god of mayhem and pestilence. Fills the wearer with fierce devotion.
  • Increases the duration of Corrupt Purge by 10 seconds.

Addon_Plague_VileEmetic.Name: Vile Emetic
Addon_Plague_VileEmetic.Description:
A foul-smelling and half-congealed potion of unidentifiable ingredients. Consumed to rapidly induce vomiting. Used to purge evil from the body.
  • Increases velocity of vomit projectiles by 10%.

Addon_Plague_DevoteesAmulet.Name: Devotee's Amulet
Addon_Plague_DevoteesAmulet.Description:
A bloodstone amulet carved intricately with the effigy of the Babylonian god of mayhem and pestilence. Fills the wearer with boundless devotion.
  • Increases duration of Corrupt Purge by 20 seconds.

Addon_Plague_WorshipTablet.Name: Worship Tablet
Addon_Plague_WorshipTablet.Description:
A stone tablet adorned with gold showing the drawings and writings of a corrupted incantation used originally to worship forgotten deities.
  • Increases speed of ingesting corruption at a Pool of Devotion by 100%.
  • Increases movement speed while holding Corrupt Purge by 4.5%.

Addon_Plague_SeveredToe.Name: Severed Toe
Addon_Plague_SeveredToe.Description:
The decaying severed toe of Adiris, weaved on a thread and worn as an amulet around the neck. Radiates with vile power.
  • Increases infection rate for Survivors who are performing interactions by 50%.

Addon_Plague_BlackIncense.Name: Black Incense
Addon_Plague_BlackIncense.Description:
A dark paste made of sharp osseous shavings. The inhaling of its foul fumes sharpens the mind's eye.
  • Survivors' auras are revealed to you for 3 seconds when they vomit.

Addon_Plague_IridescentSeal.Name: Iridescent Seal
Addon_Plague_IridescentSeal.Description:
A translucent cylindrical seal molded from The Fog Itself with the effigy of The Plague. Its surface is warm and pulsates with The Entity's power.
  • Corrupt Purge activates every time a generator is completed.
  • Decreases duration of Corrupt Purge by 20 seconds.

Addon_Ghost_WalleyesMatchbook.Name: Walleye's Matchbook
Addon_Ghost_WalleyesMatchbook.Description:
A sheet of matches from Walleye's, a small bar in Northern Roseville. A victim’s phone number is scribbled in blue. One of the incriminating pieces of evidence found.
  • Decreases Night Shroud recovery time by 2 seconds.

Addon_Ghost_DriversLicense.Name: Driver's License
Addon_Ghost_DriversLicense.Description:
A driver’s license revealing Olsen’s true identity: Danny Johnson.
  • Decreases the maximum range at which The Ghost Face can be revealed while Night Shroud is active by 8 meters.

    • "They all want to know who The Ghost Face is. But what they should ask is, who’s next." -The Ghost Face

Addon_Ghost_OlsensAddressBook.Name: Olsen's Address Book
Addon_Ghost_OlsensAddressBook.Description:
Filled in blunt, blue crabbed writing. All the Roseville murder victims are listed there, along with their phone number and address.
  • Decreases Night Shroud recovery time by 3 seconds.

Addon_Ghost_CheapCologne.Name: Cheap Cologne
Addon_Ghost_CheapCologne.Description:
Dollar store cologne with a pungent scent of rubbing alcohol. Worn by Ghost Face to make his presence known. Reserved for impromptu visits.
  • Increases Marked duration by 5 seconds.

Addon_Ghost_HeadlinesCutouts.Name: Headline Cutouts
Addon_Ghost_HeadlinesCutouts.Description:
Cutouts of articles covering unsolved murder cases from Utah to Pennsylvania. While Ghost Face only authored some of the headlines, he committed all the murders.
Compiling your success makes you proud and boosts your confidence.
  • Increases movement speed while stalking by 10%.

Addon_Ghost_TelephotoLens.Name: Telephoto Lens
Addon_Ghost_TelephotoLens.Description:
Manual focus lens to remain undetected while taking pictures from afar.
  • Decreases time required to Mark a Survivor when not leaning from cover by 0.25 seconds.
  • Increases Marked duration by 5 seconds.

Addon_Ghost_KnifeBeltClip.Name: Knife Belt Clip
Addon_Ghost_KnifeBeltClip.Description:
Perfect belt clip to scout carry your blade discreetly. No one knows what you’re planning to do tonight.
  • Decreases time required to Mark a Survivor when not leaning from cover by 0.5 seconds.

Addon_Ghost_MarkedMap.Name: Marked Map
Addon_Ghost_MarkedMap.Description:
The annotated map of Northern Roseville, Florida. Each X represents a victim of The Ghost Face. Mapping out your targets allows you to roam the streets undetected.
  • Increases duration of Killer Instinct after being revealed by 1 second.

Addon_Ghost_LastingPerfume.Name: Lasting Perfume
Addon_Ghost_LastingPerfume.Description:
An overpowering musky fragrance worn by Ghost Face to announce his presence. Reserved for victims he planned to write about.
  • Increases Marked duration by 10 seconds.

Addon_Ghost_ReusableCinchStraps.Name: Cinch Straps
Addon_Ghost_ReusableCinchStraps.Description:
Black straps that keep everything in place while on the prowl.
  • Increases crouched movement speed by 3%.

Addon_Ghost_VictimsDetailedRoutine.Name: Victim’s Detailed Routine
Addon_Ghost_VictimsDetailedRoutine.Description:
A ripped page outlining the weekly routine of Olsen’s first victim in Roseville. Compiling your victim’s habits allows you to anticipate their movements.
  • Increases duration of Killer Instinct after being revealed by 1.5 seconds.
  • Decreases the maximum range at which The Ghost Face can be revealed while Night Shroud is active by 4 meters.

    • “I’ve been watching you for a while. I wanted this to be special; the kind of headlines that people don’t forget.” -The Ghost Face

Addon_Ghost_ChewedPen.Name: Chewed Pen
Addon_Ghost_ChewedPen.Description:
Blue pen with a chewed cap that holds traces of Danny’s DNA. Incriminating evidence that was never found.
  • Decreases Night Shroud recovery time by 4 seconds.

Addon_Ghost_OlsensJournal.Name: Olsen’s Journal
Addon_Ghost_OlsensJournal.Description:
A spiral notebook filled with stained, handwritten entries. The journal details different equipment used to stalk victims. Going through your past methods triggers thrilling memories.
  • Increases movement speed while stalking by 20%.

Addon_Ghost_NightVisionMonocular.Name: Night Vision Monocular
Addon_Ghost_NightVisionMonocular.Description:
Night vision lens enabling sharp photos even when shrouded in darkness. Ideal for discreet, impromptu visits late at night.
  • Decreases time required to Mark a Survivor when not leaning from cover by 0.75 seconds.

Addon_Ghost_OlsensWallet.Name: Olsen’s Wallet
Addon_Ghost_OlsensWallet.Description:
Olsen’s wallet holds thirty dollars in cash, a video club membership card, and a folded picture of Olsen’s first Roseville victim. Carrying incriminating evidence boosts your excitement and resolve.
  • Increases movement speed while stalking by 30%.

Addon_Ghost_DropLegKnifeSheath.Name: Drop-Leg Knife Sheath
Addon_Ghost_DropLegKnifeSheath.Description:
Sheath allowing a full motion range: ideal to inflict quick and powerful wounds while moving freely. Stolen from a patrol officer the night Danny left Philadelphia.
  • Increases crouched movement speed by 8%.

    • “Gotta get ready like a scout– without the stupid patches. What I get is much better.” -The Ghost Face

Addon_Ghost_OutdoorSecurityCamera.Name: Outdoor Security Camera
Addon_Ghost_OutdoorSecurityCamera.Description:
A small surveillance camera that filmed Ghost Face breaking into a house on Belleview Road in Northern Roseville. The camera was positioned at the perfect angle to catch a glimpse of Ghost Face without providing any real clues to the police.
  • The auras of all Survivors outside of your Terror Radius are revealed for 4 seconds when a Marked Survivor is put into the dying state.

    • "An image is worth a thousand words.” –The Ghost Face

Addon_Ghost_LeatherKnifeSheath.Name: Leather Knife Sheath
Addon_Ghost_LeatherKnifeSheath.Description:
Quiet and flexible sheath to carry your blade. Movement is easier when things are fastened into place.
  • Increases crouched movement speed by 6%.

Addon_Ghost_Philly.Name: “Philly”
Addon_Ghost_Philly.Description:
Stolen camera from a victim of Olsen’s in Philadelphia, where he worked before. The film inside captured his last night in the city.
  • Decreases time required to Mark a Survivor when not leaning from cover by 0.25 seconds.

    • “Gotta love Philly: keeps giving and giving and I don’t wanna forget any of it.” –The Ghost Face

Addon_Ghost_TheGhostFaceCaughtOnTape.Name: “Ghost Face Caught on Tape”
Addon_Ghost_TheGhostFaceCaughtOnTape.Description:
Tape obtained by Olsen to write an article that terrorized Roseville.
  • Decreases time required to Mark a Survivor when leaning from cover by 1 second.
  • Increases time required to Mark a Survivor when not leaning from cover by 0.75 seconds.

    • “In this footage, a dark figure is seen entering a house late at night in Northern Roseville, Florida. The police were called the next morning to report a murder in the area. Lock your doors: a killer is in our midst, roaming freely, like a Ghost in the night.” –The Roseville Gazette

Addon_Demogorgon_RottenPumpkin.Name: Rotten Pumpkin
Addon_Demogorgon_RottenPumpkin.Description:
Pumpkin flesh infected by the rotten soil in Hawkins.
  • When traversing the Upside Down, the Portal you enter is destroyed. Gain an additional 200 Bloodpoints for the traversal.

Addon_Demogorgon_BlackHeart.Name: Black Heart
Addon_Demogorgon_BlackHeart.Description:
A black fermented heart ripped from the chest of a tentacled creature in the Upside Down.
  • Decreases Shred hit cooldown by 15%.

Addon_Demogorgon_RatLiver.Name: Rat Liver
Addon_Demogorgon_RatLiver.Description:
A soggy pile of salty, soft liver.
  • Increases movement speed while charging Of The Abyss by 3.5%.

Addon_Demogorgon_RatTail.Name: Rat Tail
Addon_Demogorgon_RatTail.Description:
A chewy rat tail for The Demogorgon to consume.
  • Increases speed of opening a Portal by 35%.

Addon_Demogorgon_StickyLining.Name: Sticky Lining
Addon_Demogorgon_StickyLining.Description:
A fetid, viscous layer that covers and expands the interdimensional tunnels.
  • Increases the distance from Portals at which Survivors can be detected by Of The Abyss by 2.5 meters.

Addon_Demogorgon_ViscousWebbing.Name: Viscous Webbing
Addon_Demogorgon_ViscousWebbing.Description:
Wet, elastic webs that broaden the interdimensional tunnels.
  • Increases time required for Survivors to seal Portals by 16%.

Addon_Demogorgon_RottenGreenTripe.Name: Rotten Green Tripe
Addon_Demogorgon_RottenGreenTripe.Description:
Rotten tripe that fuels The Demogorgon.
  • Increases Upside Down movement speed by 15%.

Addon_Demogorgon_MewsGuts.Name: Mew's Guts
Addon_Demogorgon_MewsGuts.Description:
The tasty guts of an unfortunate victim.
  • Increases the total number of available Portals by 1.
  • Decreases Shred miss cooldown by 11%.

Addon_Demogorgon_BarbsGlasses.Name: Barb's Glasses
Addon_Demogorgon_BarbsGlasses.Description:
A broken pair of glasses that traveled to the Upside Down.
  • Decreases Shred pallet break cooldown by 15%.

Addon_Demogorgon_ElevensSoda.Name: Eleven's Soda
Addon_Demogorgon_ElevensSoda.Description:
A soda can charged with psychic energy.
  • Shows yellow auras for generators being repaired while traversing the Upside Down.

Addon_Demogorgon_ThornyVines.Name: Thorny Vines
Addon_Demogorgon_ThornyVines.Description:
Thick, thorny vines that stretch and reinforce the interdimensional tunnels.
  • Increases time required for Survivors to seal Portals by 11%
  • Increases the distance from Portals at which Survivors can be detected by Of The Abyss by 1 meter.

Addon_Demogorgon_BrassCaseLighter.Name: Brass Case Lighter
Addon_Demogorgon_BrassCaseLighter.Description:
A lighter used to ignite trouble.
  • Proximity to Portals inflicts Survivors with Blindness. Once out of contact with the Portal, this effect persists for 45 seconds.

    • Blindness prevents Survivors from seeing auras.

    “Emits a strong electromagnetic field: it must have come into contact with the Upside Down.” - Hawkins National Laboratory

Addon_Demogorgon_VioletWaxCap.Name: Violet Waxcap
Addon_Demogorgon_VioletWaxCap.Description:
A dark fleshed mushroom from the Upside Down that allows The Demogorgon to telepathically distort the senses in its prey.
  • Increases the duration of the Undetectable effect gained when emerging from a Portal by 0.5 seconds.

    • Undetectable hides the Killer's aura, Terror Radius and Red Stain.

Addon_Demogorgon_DeerLung.Name: Deer Lung
Addon_Demogorgon_DeerLung.Description:
A raw, rubbery lung that reinvigorates The Demogorgon.
  • Increases Upside Down movement speed by 30%.
  • Decreases the number of available Portals by 2.

Addon_Demogorgon_LifeguardWhistle.Name: Lifeguard Whistle
Addon_Demogorgon_LifeguardWhistle.Description:
A rusty, metal whistle that once ruled the Hawkins public pool.
  • Survivors near activated Portals are indicated by Killer Instinct without having to charge Of the Abyss.

    • “Emits a strong electromagnetic field: it must have come into contact with the Upside Down.” - Hawkins National Laboratory

Addon_Demogorgon_VermillionWebcap.Name: Vermillion Webcap
Addon_Demogorgon_VermillionWebcap.Description:
A bright red poisonous mushroom from the Upside Down.
  • Increases the duration of the Undetectable effect gained when emerging from a Portal by 3 seconds.

    • Undetectable hides the Killer's aura, Terror Radius and Red Stain.

    "Still experimenting with this specimen, so far our results are inconsistent." - Hawkins National Laboratory

Addon_Demogorgon_UpsideDownResin.Name: Upside Down Resin
Addon_Demogorgon_UpsideDownResin.Description:
A sticky, flammable sap that fortifies the gateway to the interdimensional tunnels.
  • Increases time required for Survivors to seal Portals by 40%.

    • “A sample taken from a tree that concealed a Portal to another plane. Studies on its effects are inconclusive.”- Hawkins National Laboratory

Addon_Demogorgon_UnknownEgg.Name: Unknown Egg
Addon_Demogorgon_UnknownEgg.Description:
A large, warm egg coated in gruesome webbing.
  • Decreases the cooldown after traversing the Upside Down by 1.5 seconds.

    • “A large egg was sighted in the Upside Down, but no sample survived the trip to the lab for proper examination.” - Hawkins National Laboratory

Addon_Demogorgon_LerproseLichen.Name: Leprose Lichen
Addon_Demogorgon_LerproseLichen.Description:
A potent lichen that grows like dust on the rocks in the Upside Down.
  • Reveals the auras of all Survivors while traversing the Upside Down, and for 3 seconds after emerging from a Portal.

    • “One small dose can cause severe hallucinations.” - Hawkins National Laboratory

Addon_Demogorgon_RedMoss.Name: Red Moss
Addon_Demogorgon_RedMoss.Description:
A psychedelic moss that grows on tree barks in the Upside Down.
  • Increases time required to emerge from a Portal by 15%.
  • Increases the duration of the Undetectable effect gained when emerging from a Portal by 8 seconds.
  • Emerging from Portals becomes silent.

    • Undetectable hides the Killer's aura, Terror Radius, and Red Stain.

    “Consuming its leaf enhances athletic performance and causes euphoria.” - Hawkins National Laboratory

Addon_Kanobo_RottingRope.Name: Rotting Rope
Addon_Kanobo_RottingRope.Description:
Had the rope been stronger, it would have likely held Kazan. As it was, he escaped and butchered his captors.
  • Increases Blood Orb aura reading range by 2 meters.

    • "Though Death is focused, he has been known to blink." -Renjiro's Doctrine 14:5

Addon_Kanobo_BlackenedToenail.Name: Blackened Toenail
Addon_Kanobo_BlackenedToenail.Description:
Fell off during one of Kazan's hundred winter treks to the temple. Despite his pilgrimage, Akito's leg would never heal.
  • Increases movement speed while absorbing Blood Orbs by 0.3 m/s.

    • "If a father sacrifices not for his children, then who does he father?" -Renjiro's Doctrine 11:12

Addon_Kanobo_CrackedSakazuki.Name: Cracked Sakazuki
Addon_Kanobo_CrackedSakazuki.Description:
A cup from Kazan's wedding ceremony, it never made it through the night before being damaged.
  • Decreases Blood Fury activation time by 0.5 seconds.
  • Decreases Blood Fury cooldown by 0.5 seconds.

Addon_Kanobo_PaperLantern.Name: Paper Lantern
Addon_Kanobo_PaperLantern.Description:
Perhaps a memento of simpler times, before rage fully enveloped him.
  • Increases Blood Orb absorption speed by 4 m/s.

Addon_Kanobo_ChildsWoodenSword.Name: Child's Wooden Sword
Addon_Kanobo_ChildsWoodenSword.Description:
Akito's practice sword. The child had little use for it after his injury.
  • Increases Blood Orb aura reading range by 3 meters.

Addon_Kanobo_PolishedMaedate.Name: Polished Maedate
Addon_Kanobo_PolishedMaedate.Description:
A horned crest Kazan tore from his helmet after being compared to a demon.
  • Increases Yamaoka's Wrath passive charge rate by 50%.

Addon_Kanobo_ChippedSaihai.Name: Chipped Saihai
Addon_Kanobo_ChippedSaihai.Description:
A baton that belonged to Renjiro, it was stolen by Kazan upon his departure.
  • Increases Blood Fury duration by 6 seconds.

Addon_Kanobo_InkLion.Name: Ink Lion
Addon_Kanobo_InkLion.Description:
An ink painting that once hung in the Yamaoka estate. Depicts the story of a lion eaten by mice.
  • Decreases Blood Fury activation time by 0.5 seconds.
  • Decreases Blood Fury cooldown by 0.5 seconds.
  • Decreases Blood Fury consumption when downing a Survivor by 2 seconds.

Addon_Kanobo_BloodySash.Name: Bloody Sash
Addon_Kanobo_BloodySash.Description:
Blood from a boy who called Kazan The Imposter Noble. Kazan hid evidence of the fight from his father, often reveling at the sash in secret.
  • Increases movement speed while absorbing Blood Orbs by 0.6 m/s.

Addon_Kanobo_KanaianzenTalisman.Name: Kanai-anzen Talisman
Addon_Kanobo_KanaianzenTalisman.Description:
A trinket given to Kazan at birth, its powers are meant to protect his family from harm.
  • Increases movement speed of Demon Dash by 8%.

Addon_Kanobo_WoodenOniMask.Name: Wooden Oni Mask
Addon_Kanobo_WoodenOniMask.Description:
A mask that a young Kazan bought to celebrate Setsubun, its repulsively fanged mouth began haunting his nightmares.
  • Increases the frequency of Blood Orbs dropped by Survivors by 14%.
  • Survivors drop an additional Blood Orb when they vault, throw pallets, exit lockers, crouch, or fail a skill check.

    • "It is no coincidence that man is so familiar with demons." -Renjiro's Doctrine 3:8

Addon_Kanobo_YamaokaSashimono.Name: Yamaoka Sashimono
Addon_Kanobo_YamaokaSashimono.Description:
The banner of the Yamaoka family, Kazan felt an overwhelming pride from it.
  • Increases Blood Fury duration by 8 seconds.

Addon_Kanobo_ScalpedTopknot.Name: Scalped Topknot
Addon_Kanobo_ScalpedTopknot.Description:
The topknot of a samurai who questioned Kazan's honor. The roots cling to a thin strip of bloody skin.
  • Decreases time to activate Demon Dash by 0.5 seconds.

Addon_Kanobo_ShatteredWakizashi.Name: Shattered Wakizashi
Addon_Kanobo_ShatteredWakizashi.Description:
The fragments of an ancestral blade, destroyed by Kazan in a fit of rage.
  • Increases Yamaoka's Wrath passive charge rate by 100%.

Addon_Kanobo_LionFang.Name: Lion Fang
Addon_Kanobo_LionFang.Description:
A tooth sold from an exotic vendor, it symbolizes power and nobility.
  • Increases Blood Fury duration by 10 seconds.

Addon_Kanobo_SplinteredHull.Name: Splintered Hull
Addon_Kanobo_SplinteredHull.Description:
Fragments of a ship that carried Renjiro Yamaoka. Against all odds, the legendary samurai seemed to survive.
  • Increases the frequency of Blood Orbs dropped by Survivors by 33%.
  • Survivors drop an additional Blood Orb when they vault, throw pallets, exit lockers, crouch, or fail a skill check.

    • "To plan subterfuge, begin with a counsel of none." -Renjiro's Doctrine 7:9

Addon_Kanobo_TearSoakedTenugui.Name: Tear Soaked Tenugui
Addon_Kanobo_TearSoakedTenugui.Description:
The cloth that Kazan's mother cried into when he left on his pilgrimage to cleanse the samurai.
  • Decreases Blood Fury consumption when downing a Survivor by 4 seconds.

Addon_Kanobo_AkitosCrutch.Name: Akito's Crutch
Addon_Kanobo_AkitosCrutch.Description:
The crutch used by Kazan's son after falling from a tree. Akito's playmate and her family were punished for the boy's injury.
  • Increases movement speed of Demon Dash by 13%.

Addon_Kanobo_YamaokaFamilyCrest.Name: Iridescent Family Crest
Addon_Kanobo_YamaokaFamilyCrest.Description:
A crest that denotes its owner as being a part of the Yamaoka family.
  • Miss a charged attack during Blood Fury to smash the ground and create a shock wave. Any Survivors within 24 meters will scream and reveal their current location to you for 4 seconds.

    • "Know who you are so you may shield your heart." -Renjiro's Doctrine 11:2

Addon_Kanobo_RenjirosBloodyGlove.Name: Renjiro’s Bloody Glove
Addon_Kanobo_RenjirosBloodyGlove.Description:
The glove Renjiro held to his sternum following the strike dealt by his son.
  • All Survivors can see Blood Orbs at the same distance as you.
  • A Survivor's aura is revealed for 3 seconds when coming into contact with a Blood Orb.

    • "When all else spills out, cling only to your honor." -Renjiro's Doctrine 14:12

Addon_Blinker_001.Name: Plaid Flannel
Addon_Blinker_001.Description:
A torn piece of red and black plaid flannel. The scrap of fabric imbues The Nurse with devastating focus.
  • Allows the Nurse to see the Blink target location.

Addon_Blinker_002.Name: White Nit Comb
Addon_Blinker_002.Description:
A parasitic nit comb taken from the clinic. Once the symbol of a deep connection between an anxious patient and her nurse.
  • Decreases the length of Blink attack lunges by 50%.
  • Increases Bloodpoints for Blink attack score events by 100%.

Addon_Blinker_003.Name: Pocket Watch
Addon_Blinker_003.Description:
A charred and broken pocket watch with rattling pieces. Taken from Nurse Moris' body.
  • Increases the time before The Nurse succumbs to fatigue after Blinking by 20%.

Addon_Blinker_004.Name: Anxious Gasp
Addon_Blinker_004.Description:
The gasp of surprise collected from an anxious girl which The Nurse was fond of. Twitches vigorously at The Nurse's touch.
  • Blinking past a survivor causes them to scream and awards 200 Bloodpoints for spooking them.

Addon_Blinker_005.Name: Torn Bookmark
Addon_Blinker_005.Description:
A white and pristine piece of ribbon once attached to a sacred book. Serves as the symbol of a dispute.
  • Adds 1 Blink charge.
  • Increases Blink recharge time by 50%.

Addon_Blinker_006.Name: Dark Cincture
Addon_Blinker_006.Description:
A black rope used as a belt in times of mourning. Taken from Father Campbell's body.
  • Decreases Blink recharge time by 13%.

Addon_Blinker_007.Name: Fragile Wheeze
Addon_Blinker_007.Description:
The whistling and rattling breath stolen from Father Campbell. Silently curves and bends at The Nurse's touch.
  • Decreases Blink recharge time by 20%.

Addon_Blinker_008.Name: Campbell's Last Breath
Addon_Blinker_008.Description:
A powerful last breath snatched from Crotus Prenn asylum priest Father Campbell. In the hands of The Nurse, it crackles with intensity.
  • After reappearing from a fully charged Blink, The Nurse immediately Blinks at half charge in the direction she is currently facing.

Addon_Blinker_009.Name: Metal Spoon
Addon_Blinker_009.Description:
A dull, partially rusted and stained metallic spoon. Confiscated from room 202's patient, the "Bad Man".
  • Hitting a survivor with a successful Blink attack causes their sounds of pain to be 50% louder for 60 seconds.

Addon_Blinker_010.Name: Bad Man Keepsake
Addon_Blinker_010.Description:
A rotten molar extirpated from the "Bad Man's" cold dead hand.
  • Hitting a survivor with a successful Blink attack causes their aura to be revealed to when healing or being healed within a 28 meter range for 60 seconds.
