Addon_Blinker_011.Name: Wooden Horse
Addon_Blinker_011.Description:
An unpainted toy carved out of cheap wood to resemble a horse. Once the symbol of a deep connection between a catatonic patient and his nurse.
  • Decreases extra fatigue from missed Blink attacks by 50%.

Addon_Blinker_012.Name: Catatonic Boy's Treasure
Addon_Blinker_012.Description:
A pine-cone which unexpectedly calmed a patient's repetitive movement. Taken from the catatonic boy's body.
  • Decreases extra fatigue from chain Blinks by 100%.

ADDON_Lastbreath_AtaxicRespiration.Name: Ataxic Respiration
ADDON_Lastbreath_AtaxicRespiration.Description:
The irregular and deteriorating breath collected from the catatonic boy. Normally stable and calm, becomes incredibly agitated at The Nurse's touch.
  • Decreases base Blink fatigue duration by 12.5%.

ADDON_Lastbreath_BadManLastBreath.Name: "Bad Man's" Last Breath
ADDON_Lastbreath_BadManLastBreath.Description:
A powerful last breath snatched from Crotus Prenn asylum patient "the Bad Man." In the hands of The Nurse, it jolts with intensity.

  • Hitting a survivor with a successful Blink attack grants the Nurse Undetectable for 16 seconds. This effect may be only triggered once every 60 seconds.

    • Undetectable hides the Killer's aura, Terror Radius, and Red Stain.

ADDON_Lastbreath_DullBracelet.Name: Dull Bracelet
ADDON_Lastbreath_DullBracelet.Description:
A worthless piece of jewelry that might have had an important significance to someone. Taken from the anxious girl's body.
  • Decreases maximum Blink distance by 20%.
  • Increases Bloodpoints for Precise Blink score events by 100%.

ADDON_Lastbreath_HeavyPanting.Name: Heavy Panting
ADDON_Lastbreath_HeavyPanting.Description:
The slow and bulging breath stolen from the fat orderly. Dimly oscillates at The Nurse's touch.
  • Increases maximum Blink range by 20%.
  • Increases maximum Blink charge time by 20%.

ADDON_Lastbreath_JennerLastBreath.Name: Jenner's Last Breath
ADDON_Lastbreath_JennerLastBreath.Description:
A powerful last breath snatched from Crotus Prenn asylum patient Mary Jenner. In the hands of The Nurse, it trembles with intensity.
  • After Blinking, allows The Nurse to immediately Blink back to her original position by pressing the Active Ability Button. Must be triggered before The Nurse succumbs to fatigue.

ADDON_Lastbreath_KavanaghLastBreath.Name: Kavanagh's Last Breath
ADDON_Lastbreath_KavanaghLastBreath.Description:
A powerful last breath snatched from Crotus Prenn asylum orderly Harvey Kavanagh. In the hands of The Nurse, it wobbles with intensity.
  • Increases maximum Blink range by 30%.
  • Increases maximum Blink charge time by 30%.

ADDON_Lastbreath_Matchbox.Name: Matchbox
ADDON_Lastbreath_Matchbox.Description:
A matchbox containing an odd collection of mismatched buttons. Serves as a reminder of a horrible place.
  • Removes 1 Blink charge.
  • Increases The Nurse's base movement speed to 4.2 m/s.

ADDON_Lastbreath_SpasmodicBreath.Name: Spasmodic Breath
ADDON_Lastbreath_SpasmodicBreath.Description:
The twitchy and tremulous breath stolen from the "Bad Man." Aggressively pulses and jumps at The Nurse's touch.
  • Hitting a survivor with a successful Blink attack disables the ability to Blink and increases the Nurse's base movement speed to 4.6 m/s for 60 seconds.

Addon_Harpoon_RicketyChain.Name: Rickety Chain
Addon_Harpoon_RicketyChain.Description:
Weak steel links first used on Caleb's prototype Speargun. Despite the chain's failings, it holds sentimental value.
  • Grants 50% bonus Bloodpoints for Speared score events.
  • Survivors break free 33% faster.

Addon_Harpoon_SpitPolishRag.Name: Spit Polish Rag
Addon_Harpoon_SpitPolishRag.Description:
A grimy piece of burlap. Spit and elbow grease was enough to wipe down the speargun in the heat of a shootout.
  • Decreases The Redeemer's miss cooldown by 0.25 seconds.

Addon_Harpoon_ModifiedAmmoBelt.Name: Modified Ammo Belt
Addon_Harpoon_ModifiedAmmoBelt.Description:
An old ammo belt Caleb altered for his specialized weaponry. Still holds the fine red dirt of the Arizona Territory desert.
  • Decreases The Redeemer's reload time by 0.25 seconds.

Addon_Harpoon_SnakeOil.Name: Snake Oil
Addon_Harpoon_SnakeOil.Description:
A tincture of oils and extracts purchased from a travelling salesman. Purported to cure all that ails you.
  • Increases The Redeemer's reeling speed by 5%.

Addon_Harpoon_RustedSpike.Name: Rusted Spike
Addon_Harpoon_RustedSpike.Description:
A railroad spike that Caleb fastened to the front of the Speargun during a moment of morbid curiosity. The dull tip prevents it from cleanly piercing its target.
  • The Redeemer's shots inflict Mangled.

    • Mangled increases time required to heal by 25% and lasts until fully healed.

Addon_Harpoon_JawSmasher.Name: Jaw Smasher
Addon_Harpoon_JawSmasher.Description:
The bullet that ripped through Caleb’s jaw during a frenzied shootout. It brings back a burning desire for revenge.
  • Increases movement speed by 1% while aiming down The Redeemer's sights.

    • "You called death to your door the instant you done me wrong." -Caleb Quinn

Addon_Harpoon_ChewingTobacco.Name: Chewing Tobacco
Addon_Harpoon_ChewingTobacco.Description:
A can of clipped and sweetened tobacco leaves lifted from a gutted body in Glenvale. Stimulates the nervous system.
  • Decreases the stun duration when Survivors break free by 0.5 seconds.

Addon_Harpoon_PoisonOakLeaves.Name: Poison Oak Leaves
Addon_Harpoon_PoisonOakLeaves.Description:
An ordinary looking plant, Caleb found that spears coated in its oil caused unbearable blistering around wounds.
  • Increases Survivor mend time by 1.5 seconds.

Addon_Harpoon_MarshalsBadge.Name: Marshal's Badge
Addon_Harpoon_MarshalsBadge.Description:
A silver badge taken from the corpse of a lawman in Arizona Territory who interfered with the Hellshire Gang’s bounties.
  • Decreases Terror Radius by 4 meters while aiming down The Redeemer's sights.

    • “Get your prayers in, you’ll be swinging by noon.” -Caleb Quinn

Addon_Harpoon_HoneyLocustThorns.Name: Honey Locust Thorns
Addon_Harpoon_HoneyLocustThorns.Description:
Angered with a bounty who fled twice before, Caleb twisted thorn branches onto a spear and let it loose.
  • Breaking free from the spear inflicts Mangled.

    • Mangled increases time required to heal by 25% and lasts until fully healed.

Addon_Harpoon_TinOilCan.Name: Tin Oil Can
Addon_Harpoon_TinOilCan.Description:
A can holding a small amount of oil to reduce friction in machinery. Early models of the Speargun were notorious for jamming, and oil had to be readily available.
  • Decreases The Redeemer's miss cooldown by 0.5 seconds.

Addon_Harpoon_WantedPoster.Name: Wanted Poster
Addon_Harpoon_WantedPoster.Description:
The yellowed remains of a wanted poster for Mason Kelly. Kept Caleb focused on the hunt.
  • Increases movement speed by 2.5% while aiming down The Redeemer's sights.

    • "You'll be met with a fierce reckoning, swear it on my mum’s grave." -Caleb Quinn

Addon_Harpoon_WardensKeys.Name: Warden’s Keys
Addon_Harpoon_WardensKeys.Description:
The dull jangle of the keys evokes a furious memory within Caleb.
  • Decreases The Redeemer's reload time by 0.5 seconds.

Addon_Harpoon_BayshoresGoldTooth.Name: Bayshore’s Gold Tooth
Addon_Harpoon_BayshoresGoldTooth.Description:
A golden tooth torn from Henry Bayshore as he screamed for mercy, hours before he was finished off.
  • Increases The Redeemer's reeling speed by 9%.

    • “Know your place, boy. Know your damn place.” -Henry Bayshore

Addon_Harpoon_BayshoresCigar.Name: Bayshore’s Cigar
Addon_Harpoon_BayshoresCigar.Description:
A quality cigar, plucked from the jacket of Caleb’s boss while he wailed over the spear lodged in his abdomen.
  • Decreases the stun duration when Survivors break free by 1 second.

    • “Do not point that thing at me, you slack-jawed imbecile.” -Henry Bayshore

Addon_Harpoon_BarbedWire.Name: Barbed Wire
Addon_Harpoon_BarbedWire.Description:
Pliable American made steel lined with sharp barbs. Despite its simplicity, Caleb found it could be wrapped around a spear to increase its viciousness.
  • Increases Survivor mend time by 3.5 seconds.

    • “There won’t be nothing to fear soon. Till then, fear me.” -Caleb Quinn

Addon_Harpoon_ClearCreekWhiskey.Name: Gold Creek Whiskey
Addon_Harpoon_ClearCreekWhiskey.Description:
Warm comfort in a bottle that quelled Caleb’s anger and slowed his step.
  • Decreases Terror Radius by 8 meters while aiming down The Redeemer's sights.

    • “A smooth taste for the rugged frontier” -Gold Creek Advertisement, 1876

Addon_Harpoon_PrisonChain.Name: Prison Chain
Addon_Harpoon_PrisonChain.Description:
A thick, heavy chain that once held a steel ball and latched to Caleb’s ankle. It’s been repurposed to hook onto a spear.
  • Increases time required for a Survivor to break free from a spear by 10%.

    • “Inmates working beyond the prison yard must be affixed with a steel ball of no less than 18 pounds.” -Hellshire Penitentiary Guard Book

Addon_Harpoon_HellshireIron.Name: Hellshire Iron
Addon_Harpoon_HellshireIron.Description:
The Hellshire Gang’s branding iron. Despite folklore, it never made its mark on new initiates, instead having been used to brand particularly quarrelsome bounties.
  • When a Survivor is speared, gain Undetectable. The effect persists for 10 seconds after the Survivor is no longer speared.

    • Undetectable hides the Killer's aura, Terror Radius and Red Stain.

    “Hellshire Gang: Justice Seekers or Outlaws?” -Glenvale Gazette headline

Addon_Harpoon_IridescentCoin.Name: Iridescent Coin
Addon_Harpoon_IridescentCoin.Description:
A glass-like coin molded from The Fog itself. Payment to the bounty hunter for services rendered.
  • Survivors speared from at least 12 meters away are inflicted with Exposed for as long as they remain speared.

    • Exposed survivors will be downed by basic attacks even if uninjured.

    “Deals made in desperation are paid for in madness.”

ADDON_TormentMode_LeadRing.Name: Lead Ring
ADDON_TormentMode_LeadRing.Description:
Found in a refrigerator. It’s engraved with a disgusting, bloated face.
  • Increases the duration of trails left by Rites of Judgment by 10 seconds.

ADDON_TormentMode_DeadButterfly.Name: Dead Butterfly
ADDON_TormentMode_DeadButterfly.Description:
A butterfly found on a bed at Wood Side Apartments. It’s frail and nearly falls apart when touched.
  • Decreases time required to recharge Rites of Judgment by 2 seconds.

ADDON_TormentMode_BlackStrap.Name: Black Strap
ADDON_TormentMode_BlackStrap.Description:
A nylon strap that was used to restrain a victim to a metal frame. The color makes it difficult to see the blood soaked into it.
  • Increases the range of Punishment of the Damned by 0.5 meters.

ADDON_TormentMode_CopperRing.Name: Copper Ring
ADDON_TormentMode_CopperRing.Description:
Found in the basement of Brookhaven Hospital. It’s engraved with a picture of a spider.
  • Increases maximum duration of Rites of Judgment by 1 second.

    • “I was locked up inside the basement’s basement. It was so small and dark, and I was so afraid. I dropped my precious ring. But I’ll never, ever go back there.”

ADDON_TormentMode_CinderellaMusicBox.Name: Cinderella Music Box
ADDON_TormentMode_CinderellaMusicBox.Description:
A music box with a figure from the fairy tale Cinderella. Found inside a suitcase adorned with stickers from multiple destinations.
  • Increases the duration of trails left by Rites of Judgment by 15 seconds.

ADDON_TormentMode_ForgottenVideotape.Name: Forgotten Videotape
ADDON_TormentMode_ForgottenVideotape.Description:
A videotape of two lovers vacationing in Silent Hill. Despite its sentimental value, it was left behind in the Lakeview Hotel.
  • Decreases time required to recharge Rites of Judgment by 3 seconds.

ADDON_TormentMode_WaxDoll.Name: Wax Doll
ADDON_TormentMode_WaxDoll.Description:
A doll carved from wax, handcrafted by a prisoner who would soon face their judgment.
  • Increases the range of Punishment of the Damned by 1 meter.

ADDON_TormentMode_Spearhead.Name: Spearhead
ADDON_TormentMode_Spearhead.Description:
The sharp, rusted tip of a spear. It’s flaked with blood from its last victim.
  • Increases maximum duration of Rites of Judgment by 1.5 seconds.

ADDON_TormentMode_LeopardPrintFabric.Name: Leopard-Print Fabric
ADDON_TormentMode_LeopardPrintFabric.Description:
A shred of pink, leopard print fabric. It’s difficult to tell what it was used for.
  • Increases the duration of Killer Instinct when triggered by Rites of Judgment by 0.5 seconds.

    • “It doesn’t matter who I am. I’m here for you, James.” -Maria

ADDON_TormentMode_MannequinFoot.Name: Mannequin Foot
ADDON_TormentMode_MannequinFoot.Description:
The smooth grey foot of a mannequin, brutally torn from its leg.
  • Increases the duration of trails left by Rites of Judgment by 20 seconds.

ADDON_TormentMode_ValtielSectPhotograph.Name: Valtiel Sect Photograph
ADDON_TormentMode_ValtielSectPhotograph.Description:
A photograph of two figures in red hoods. Entitled Crimson and White Banquet for the Gods.
  • Decreases time required to recharge Rites of Judgment by 4 seconds.

ADDON_TormentMode_BurningManPainting.Name: Burning Man Painting
ADDON_TormentMode_BurningManPainting.Description:
A diagram of the Lakeview Hotel. Red flames are painted over this place of guilt.
  • Increases the range of Punishment of the Damned by 1.5 meters.

ADDON_TormentMode_TabletoftheOppressor.Name: Tablet of the Oppressor
ADDON_TormentMode_TabletoftheOppressor.Description:
A metal tablet engraved with Aztec figures.
  • Increases maximum duration of Rites of Judgment by 2 seconds.

ADDON_TormentMode_MistyDayRemainsofJudgm.Name: Misty Day, Remains of Judgment
ADDON_TormentMode_MistyDayRemainsofJudgm.Description:
A painting of an imposing figure wearing a steel pyramid atop his head. Victims are caged in the background.
  • Increases the duration of Killer Instinct when triggered by Rites of Judgment by 1 second.

    • "It’s him...”

ADDON_TormentMode_ScarletEgg.Name: Scarlet Egg
ADDON_TormentMode_ScarletEgg.Description:
A fresh egg, strikingly red in color. About the size of a quail’s egg.
  • Increases the duration of Killer Instinct when triggered by Rites of Judgment by 1.5 seconds.

    • "I’ve never been so scared in my whole life! You couldn’t care less about me... could you?” -Maria

ADDON_TormentMode_RustcoloredEgg.Name: Rust-colored Egg
ADDON_TormentMode_RustcoloredEgg.Description:
An old-looking egg, colored reddish orange. About the size of a quail’s egg.
  • Rites of Judgment trails inflict Blindness for 60 seconds.

    • Blindness prevents Survivors from seeing auras.

    “James... You made me happy.” -Mary

ADDON_TormentMode_LostMemoriesBook.Name: Lost Memories Book
ADDON_TormentMode_LostMemoriesBook.Description:
A book about the history and legends of Silent Hill and the surrounding area.
  • Rites of Judgment trails inflict Oblivious for 15 seconds.

    • Oblivious prevents Survivors from hearing or being affected by the Killer's Terror Radius.

    “They called this place ‘The Place of the Silent Spirits.’”

ADDON_TormentMode_CrimsonCeremoneyBook.Name: Crimson Ceremony Book
ADDON_TormentMode_CrimsonCeremoneyBook.Description:
A book about an ancient god. Author unknown.
  • Rites of Judgment trails inflict Hemorrhage until Torment ends.

    • Hemorrhage increases blood trails left by injured Survivors.

    “Speak. I am the Crimson One. The lies and the mist are not they, but I.”

ADDON_TormentMode_ObsidianGoblet.Name: Obsidian Goblet
ADDON_TormentMode_ObsidianGoblet.Description:
An ancient looking goblet carved from pure obsidian.
  • Grants Undetectable while standing on a Rites of Judgment trail.

    • Undetectable hides the Killer's aura, terror radius, and red stain.

    “Forgive me for waking you. But without you, I just can’t go on.” -James Sunderland

ADDON_TormentMode_IridescentSealofMetatr.Name: Iridescent Seal of Metatron
ADDON_TormentMode_IridescentSealofMetatr.Description:
A talisman with an odd design inscribed on it. The Entity’s influence seems to have altered it.
  • When sending a Survivor to a Cage of Atonement, the auras of all Survivors suffering from Torment are revealed for 6 seconds.

    • "This magic square, with strong protective and dispelling properties, is called the 'Virun VII Crest' or the 'Seal of Metatron'.”

Addon_Rush_CompoundSeven.Name: Compound Seven
Addon_Rush_CompoundSeven.Description:
This early sample failed to achieve desired results but demonstrated surprising effects regardless.
  • Automatically face the nearest Survivor within 16 meters after a Slam.

Addon_Rush_ChippedMonocle.Name: Chipped Monocle
Addon_Rush_ChippedMonocle.Description:
A monocle Talbot rarely used despite his eyesight weakening in later years.
  • Displays the target location of a Slam.

Addon_Rush_PlaceboTablet.Name: Placebo Tablet
Addon_Rush_PlaceboTablet.Description:
A pill that’s utterly ineffective... or is it?
  • Decreases movement speed while Rushing by 15%.
  • Gain 100% bonus Bloodpoints on Rush score events.

Addon_Rush_Foxglove.Name: Foxglove
Addon_Rush_Foxglove.Description:
A poisonous plant that sparked Talbot’s interest in chemistry. It rekindles deeply buried memories.
  • Decreases Rush recovery time by 0.25 seconds.

Addon_Rush_ShreddedNotes.Name: Shredded Notes
Addon_Rush_ShreddedNotes.Description:
The remnants of Talbot’s notes, they still contain some valuable information within.
  • Decreases maximum Rush tokens by 1.
  • Decreases time to recharge a Rush token by 0.33 seconds.

Addon_Rush_PustulaDust.Name: Pustula Dust
Addon_Rush_PustulaDust.Description:
Dried pustula petals ground into a fine dust.
  • Increases maximum Slam duration by 0.75 seconds.

Addon_Rush_PlagueBile.Name: Plague Bile
Addon_Rush_PlagueBile.Description:
A sample of The Plague’s bile, distilled and treated with a mixture of chemicals.
  • Increases turn rate while Rushing by 10%.

Addon_Rush_CankerThorn.Name: Canker Thorn
Addon_Rush_CankerThorn.Description:
A sizable thorn snipped from a visceral canker. It secretes a mild toxin.
  • Decreases recovery time after Rushing by 0.5 seconds.

Addon_Rush_BlightedRat.Name: Blighted Rat
Addon_Rush_BlightedRat.Description:
A rat that briefly returned to life when injected with serum, becoming aggressive and uncontrollable.
  • Increases speed while Rushing by 4% for each consecutive Rush.

Addon_Rush_CompoundTwentyOne.Name: Compound Twenty-One
Addon_Rush_CompoundTwentyOne.Description:
A serum that's fatal to humans. It evokes beneficial qualities in those who are... something more.
  • Reveals the auras of all Survivors within 8 meters for 3 seconds after a Slam.

Addon_Rush_RoseTonic.Name: Rose Tonic
Addon_Rush_RoseTonic.Description:
A mixture made with dried roses from the exceedingly rare New Moon Bouquet.
  • Increases maximum Slam duration by 1 second.
    •

Addon_Rush_UmbraSalts.Name: Umbra Salts
Addon_Rush_UmbraSalts.Description:
Regular sea salt that has momentarily passed through the spirit world, altering its properties in the process.
  • Increases turn rate while Rushing by 15%.

Addon_Rush_AdrenalineVial.Name: Adrenaline Vial
Addon_Rush_AdrenalineVial.Description:
A hormone removed from an unwilling subject’s adrenal gland. Though it provides a jolt of energy, it can fatigue its user.
  • Decreases time to recharge a Rush token by 1 second.
  • Increases Rushing speed by 10%.
  • Increases maximum Rush tokens by 2.
  • Increases maximum look angle while Rushing by 20 degrees.
  • Decreases turn rate while Rushing by 55%.


    • "Please, don't do this..."

Addon_Rush_BlightedCrow.Name: Blighted Crow
Addon_Rush_BlightedCrow.Description:
A dead crow that has been grotesquely mutated by blight serum.
  • Increases speed while Rushing by 6% for each consecutive Rush.

Addon_Rush_AlchemistsRing.Name: Alchemist’s Ring
Addon_Rush_AlchemistsRing.Description:
A ring given to chemists graduating from the London School of Medicine. It’s a reminder of unrestrained ambition.
  • Hitting a Survivor with a Lethal Rush attack will instantly recharge all Rush tokens.


    • "The student is accused of grave robbing with the intent of unsanctioned scientific testing." —Faculty reprimand of Talbot Grimes, 1838

Addon_Rush_SummoningStone.Name: Summoning Stone
Addon_Rush_SummoningStone.Description:
Talbot used this stone to carve what he believed was his research into the opium den’s walls.
  • Hitting a Survivor with a Lethal Rush attack will call upon The Entity to block pallets from being pulled down within a 16 meter radius of your location for 15 seconds.


    • "Death is only the beginning."

Addon_Rush_SoulChemical.Name: Soul Chemical
Addon_Rush_SoulChemical.Description:
A chemical squeezed from the pineal gland of a recently deceased Survivor.
  • Trigger a difficult skill check for any healing or repairing Survivor within 16 meters while Rushing.
  • Does not trigger for Survivors in range at the start of the Rush.


    • "...suspected to cause atypical alterations in neural rhythmic activity." —Unlabeled mystery school text

Addon_Rush_VigosJournal.Name: Vigo's Journal
Addon_Rush_VigosJournal.Description:
The journal of a man who claimed to have returned from the Void. The knowledge within has practical applications.
  • Grants Undetectable while Rushing.

    • Undetectable hides the Killer's aura, terror radius and red stain.

    "In a wasteland of forgotten dreams and endless routine, the man with a way out is God." —Talbot Grimes

Addon_Rush_CompoundThirtyThree.Name: Compound Thirty-Three
Addon_Rush_CompoundThirtyThree.Description:
Talbot’s penultimate attempt at a serum. Though it did not facilitate his escape, it did have powerful side effects.
  • Any Survivor within 16 meters of a Slam will be Hindered by 3% for 3 seconds.
  • Slamming pallets or breakable walls will destroy them and stun The Blight for 1.5 seconds.

    • Hindered reduces Survivor movement speed.

    "Time is scarce. Let this be the one..." —Talbot Grimes

Addon_Rush_IridescentBlightTag.Name: Iridescent Blight Tag
Addon_Rush_IridescentBlightTag.Description:
A glass-like laboratory tag, molded from The Fog itself. Either a gift from The Entity or a cruel jest to tag The Blight as he once did to others.
  • While all Rush tokens have been used, a Lethal Rush attack hit will put a Survivor into the Dying State.


    • "Progress requires drastic change." —Talbot Grimes

Addon_Killer_Halloween2020.Name: Blight Serum
Addon_Killer_Halloween2020.Description:
A small amount of Compound Thirty-Four, the final serum The Blight worked on before his transformation. Causes extreme mutations in high doses.

  • You gain 1 charge of Blighted Rush that replaces your Killer power until consumed. Press the Power button to initiate a Blighted Rush, allowing you to quickly dash forward.
  • You can not attack during a Blighted Rush.
  • You gain 1 additional charge of Blighted Rush every time you hook a Survivor, up to a maximum of 1 charge.
  • This add-on may have unknown effects on certain Killers.
  • Only playable during the Midnight Grove Event.

Addon_Flashlight_BrokenBulb.Name: Broken Bulb
Addon_Flashlight_BrokenBulb.Description:
A damaged bulb that causes a spooky flickering effect.

  • Causes the Flashlight to flicker.
  • Increases the brightness of the Flashlight beam by 15%.
  • Increases Blindness duration by 30%.
  • Increases the spookiness just a little.

Addon_Medkit_BlightedSyringe.Name: Refined Serum
Addon_Medkit_BlightedSyringe.Description:
A refined version of the putrid serum that’s mostly safe for human consumption. Mostly.

  • Press the Secondary Action button while healing with the Med-kit to use the Refined Serum.
  • Increases the speed of the Survivor by 5% for 20 seconds.
  • Creates a blight trail behind the Survivor.
  • Consumes the Med-kit on use.
